choices: Facing Destiny?
1.content:
"Ethan, come on...we're gonna be late!" Casey's impatient voice snapped you away from your happy daydream. A long couple of months' Summer Vacation, then your new life at college will begin! Muttering a non-committal response to your cute, blonde friend, you head after her as she tugged at your sleeve, joining her at the main queue.

The Carnival has come to town. Again! For as long as you can remember, this has been a summer tradition. When you were a kid, alongside Casey for pretty much each of your visits, it had seemed novel and exciting. Not anymore! "Really Casey? Aren't you a bit old for this?"

"Aw, you love it really!" She giggles at you, wrinkling her nose in such an adorable way that it makes you wonder why the two of you haven't hooked up already. "Some of the other guys will be there. Jessica will be there too..."

The mention of the super-hot Jessica makes your stomach clench a little, as it usually does. "Ha, yeah, whatever," you reply nonchalantly, though the smirk on your blonde friend's face is more than a little infuriating.

Sure enough when you go through the main entrance, you see several of the other guys from school; technically, your former school, now that you've graduated! Greeting and fist bumping several of the other guys from your basketball team, you try to be cool around Jessica, who gives you a brief hello. There's still time to get with her...imagine what a conquest that would be...laying Jessica Hope...the hottest girl you've ever met...

To be fair, you could have pretty much any pick of girls. Being on the basketball team, athletic and good-looking, getting girls had always come easily for you.

As the group of you naturally begin to split off, with a sense of nostalgia and inevitably to the different arcades and rides, a new, unusual-looking tent catches your eye. Noticing that Jessica is standing right next to you and also staring at it curiously, you use this as an opportunity to impress her.

"Ha...those Fortune Teller tents...what a waste of money! I mean, how stupid do they think people are - to actually pay for that crap? Look what it's called: 'Find Your Destiny With The Mystical Goddess Sasha'... Ha!" You tell her with a disdainful chuckle.

Giving you a withering look and arched eyebrow, you know instantly it was the wrong thing to say. "Well, I think it's cool, actually. None of the other guys have the guts to actually go there. Risk finding out about their futures. Like, guys are really just scared little kids."

"Well, uh, it doesn't scare me," you retort, feeling your heart race around this gorgeous girl. "I mean, I could...go..."

"Awesome! Well, let me know how you get on!" She beams at you, which is enough to convince you that you're actually going through with this. Grinning at her before heading towards the pale blue, mysterious looking tent, you are greeted by a very striking yet pompous woman who could be aged anything between 20 and 30....but it's hard to tell as she has a certain wisdom about her.

"Welcome, boy. You are here to have your destiny read...to have your fortune told...to find out what awaits you in these dark and uncertain times...yes?" The woman peers at you, speaking in a foreign accent that was difficult to distinguish. "My name is Goddess Sasha," she adds, rather needlessly.

"Er, yeah, I guess..." You mutter disinterestedly. "How long will this take...and it's free, right?"

Sitting on a chair opposite you, behind a desk covered with blue satin, along with various orbs and unusual objects, she stares at you, clearly unimpressed. "Goddess Sasha requires a tribute. If you want your future read, explained and articulated to you in the most enlightened way possible, then there is no need to ask about such existential concepts such as time.."

What the hell is she going on about?!

"So you're Goddess Sasha, but you refer to yourself in the third person? And can you speak in plain English? How much money and how long will this thing take?" You reply in a sardonic tone sitting down reluctantly on the chair directly opposite her, feeling the need to ridicule this fraud. She's probably made loads of money out of gullible idiots.

The ethereal-looking yet admittedly beautiful woman glares at you, shaking her head slowly from side to side. "I decide upon a monetary convenience that is based upon my subject's willingness to respect and believe....respect and believe the ancient ways and the ancient mysticism that I invoke. For you..." She looks you up and down in disdain. "One hundred US dollars."

"A hundred...a hundred dollars! That's...that's...!" You splutter at her, taken aback. One dollar...maybe even two would be sufficient for this crappy service, surely!

"You are a weak, spineless man..." She tells you in a disapproving tone. "Not even willing to pay me or show me respect." Bafflingly, Goddess Sasha proceeds to put both bare feet up on her table, forcing you to stare directly at them.

Feet...you hate feet! It's always been the one thing that you simply could not stand. As if she could know that you detested them THIS much!

Almost pulling away in disgust, it takes a concerted effort not to yell out in protest. "You're a nut job! Charging me a hundred dollars...then putting your disgusting bare feet on the table in front of me...!"

"Apologise to Goddess Sasha, then I will forgive you, boy. I will allow you to have your fortune read for a...reduced price... All you have to do is admit that you have been disrespectful to Goddess Sasha, then you will have my forgiveness and we can begin the procedure," She tells you this completely calmly, though there is a certain menace about her. Her bare feet, several toes of which are adorned with toe rings, each ankle sporting an anklet wiggle in front of you, as though she's expecting you to surrender your pride, just so you can have your fortune told...

"Forget it," you snarl at her. "You are a fraud. A FRAUD! Standing to your feet and glaring at her, you feel genuinely enraged and full of scorn. "You're nothing but a con artist! Getting teenagers like me to pay you good money for some magic mumbo-jumbo bullshit?! You don't have any fucking powers, you loon! I'm gonna tell everyone that you are a weirdo, who puts her feet in front of their customers' faces. Seriously, get a proper job, you idiot! And no fucking way are you getting a cent out of me!" With that you glare at her while she continues to stare at you, slowly spreading her toes and shaking her head from side to side.

"You...you will curse the day that you showed disrespect to Goddess Sasha. I have created personal hells that your worst possible fears could not even begin to equate to!" The striking woman's eyebrows raise and a fury seems to sparkle inside of her eyes. "You, Ethan Price, will be subjected to all manners of humiliation and degradation! You will wish that you begged and kissed Goddess Sasha's feet, rather than spoke with such disharmony and ingratitude!" With that, she suddenly produces a handful of what seems to be glittery powder and throws it directly at you, making you cough and splutter, clawing at your eyes in frustrated surprise.

"What the...you fucking bitch!" You yell, finally getting rid of the dust so that you can rough her up a bit, to tell that she's a woman! However, Goddess Sasha is gone. Totally gone. Instead, there is a small orb, almost like a magic eight ball, in that it has some writing on the outside of it.

Welcome to your hell.

The words send shivers down your spine but anger soon takes over. Who the hell does she think she is? Throwing some powder crap in your face then somehow getting away before you could confront her. Still, at least you don't have to pay her anything! As you turn around and leave the way you came in, another thought crosses your mind. She knew your name! Well, that is weird, you have to admit. Still, it doesn't mean anything.

Stepping out of the tent, you nearly walk right into someone.

"You?" You say in total surprise at the person in front of you...
1.title: Meeting Goddess Sasha

choices: Tell her to get lost! You can't trust anybody right now
She is your only hope, stick with her
She is part of this, attack her!
Ask her more questions to test her and see if she can be trusted
Character Bio
11.content:
After bumping into the strange girl, you look at her and instantly recognise her... But you don't know her name. She is from your school, but to be honest you never wanted anything to do with the freak. She now is staring directly back at you.

"Hey, I know you.... You're from my school... Ummm.... Daisy?" you say, looking at the gothic girl dressed in black.

"It's Destiny, Ethan... And what the hell have you done?" she says sternly.

"Excuse me? What have I done? What the hell are you talking about" you reply aggressively.

"You pissed off Goddess Sasha, and now we are both in her world... Her Abyss!" she says in fear, but with a slight undertone of excitement.

"Her world? What is wrong with you... Wait, you actually think she has powers?" you ask jokingly, unable to believe this crazy freak actually seems to think you're in a different world.

The girl explains... "Can't you feel it? This world is now...different! Yes, there are still people here...you're still at The Carnival, but she's changed it. Goddess Sasha has changed everything! Yes, she has powers... Ethan, this is not the carnival you came from before you entered her tent..."

You look around you, and to your horror she is right. What the hell happened? You start to wonder. "Well if that's the case, why are you here? How do you know this? Are you in on this shit too?" you say, half-scared half-pissed off.

"I may be the only person here that knows what's going on. I have powers of my own, but they are no where near as strong as Goddess Sasha. She is hundreds of years old and more powerful than you could possibly imagine. It seems she has brought me and others here to break you Ethan" Destiny says in a whisper, leaning forwards close to your ear.

"To break me? What do you mean?" you ask shakily.

"You disrespected her, didn't you? Ethan, Goddess Sasha is not one to disrespect, especially if your a male. She comes from medieval times, when males hunted witches and tried to kill them. She does not tolerate disrespect. I'm afraid your only way out of this may be to....well, I'll put it bluntly.... bow down at her feet and become her slave for eternity..." she says awkwardly.

"At her feet?" You remember her putting her feet up in front of you and you cringe. The idea of being at Goddess Sasha's - or anyone for that matter, even Jessica's feet - made you feel a little sick to the stomach. "Her slave for eternity? That is NOT going to happen Destiny!"

"You seem to have a problem with feet Ethan, if that is the case, I would watch out because she will definitely know this. Goddess Sasha has this power, this skill to absorb what's inside your mind and create a new world based on it. Your fears will be realised and used against you! She would love nothing more than to humble you and have you kneel and willingly worship the one thing you detest... The ultimate symbol of submission and defeat. Ethan, I may be your only hope through this. You need to trust me, or we will both be stuck in this world forever!" Destiny says with a certainly that chills you to the bone.

What do you do? Do you trust her and hope she can help you out of this? Or do you push her aside and deal with this yourself? After all, if she has powers too, how do you know she isn't trying to break you like Goddess Sasha apparently is?
11.title: Facing Destiny?

choices: To head to the haunted house
To go to the mirror maze
To check out the carnival games
111.content:
This seems all too strange to be real, I mean, seriously? This girl thinks you're in some fantasy world concocted by an evil Goddess that is hundreds of years old, yet looks like she is your age? You look around and see people laughing and playing, no different from the carnival before you went in that tent. You look back to Destiny to tell her your decision.

"Yeah, look, I have nothing against you Daisy, bu-"

"-it's Destiny!" she interrupts you.

"Whatever, I have nothing against you", you continue. "But I'm not into this wierd mystical voodoo shit okay? So just leave me alone, alright?"

You turn and start to walk away.

"Ethan, you're making a big mistake", Destiny yells out to you. You ignore her and keep walking. "Ethan wait, fine, I'll let you go, but let me just say one more thing!"

You stop... If hearing her out will mean she will drop this crap, then so be it. You turn to face her.

"You do hate feet, don't you?" she asks.

You look at her confused. "Well, yeah but it's not strange to hate feet, hell, most people do! It would be more strange if I had a fetish for them, that would be really messed up!"

"Look, if I'm right, Goddess Sasha will want to make you develop a foot fetish so you spend the rest of your life worshipping the one thing you hate. But it is VERY important you don't worship her feet. If.... If you do happen to find yourself attracted to feet, know that... You... You can have mine," Destiny says, motioning down at her Gothic boots.

You can only imagine her pale sweaty feet inside those Gothic boots, and the thought makes you sick to your stomach.

"That is disgusting! No.... Just... Just no! Goodbye", you say, turning and walking to the park to find your friends.

As you look around, you can't seem to see anybody you know... You decide...
111.title: The Parting Offer

choices: You explore a bit
You run into someone
Things start getting trippy
1111.content:
As you walk around the carnival, you find yourself standing in front of what looks to be your average cheesy haunted house, complete with dollar store decorations. Seeing it as a good way to get a laugh, you walk up to the lady that seems to be running the attraction. She had silver hair and an innocent look in her eyes. She soon notices your approach.

"Hello there, welcome to Bunny's mansion of control. Just you going in big boy?" She asks with a flutter of her eyes. You take a quick look down at her name tag before answering.

"Yeah, just me miss... Bunny." You tell her.

"That's Goddess Bunny, but I'll spare you the titles this time. That will be twenty dollars for one." She says before you hand her the money. "Well, if you're going in, you'll need this." She says as she straps some sort of digital watch to your wrist. It seems frozen at 60:00, implying some sort of countdown timer.

"What's this for?" You ask, confused at the odd gizmo.

"That's how long you have to get out. Once you step in there, the doors will shut behind you and get locked, and it's up to you to find the key. You have one hour, find the key and get out before this clock runs out. Do it in the first thirty minutes and you'll get a special prize from me." With the purr in her voice at the end there, you can only assume that this prize involves a happy ending for you.

"And what if I dont do it in before an hour passes?" You ask.

"Let's just say you don't want that to happen. By the way, beware the traps and monsters you'll find in there." She says, making you chuckle as you expect the traps to just be puffs of air in your face, and some underpaid intern in a costume acting like a monster. You begin to head inside. "Good luck." You hear her say from behind you. You walk in, and like she said, the doors behind you close and lock and the timer on your watch starts.

What happens next?
1111.title: Haunted House Time

choices: Go upstairs
Continue on this floor
Head down to the basement
11111.content:
Well, you're on the clock now. If you want this happy ending from the cute girl out front, you need to find this key quickly. Figuring that they wouldn't just leave it on a table with a sign that says "Key Here -->", you start exploring the place to try and find where they'd hidden it. As you began to look around the main hall, you quickly notice how much bigger this place looked inside than it was on the outside.

It was huge. Outside this place looked no bigger than a fishing shack, yet this hall alone looked big enough to hold one of those inside with room to spare. Must be some kind of trick, whether it was a trick to make the outside look smaller or the inside look bigger is beyond you right now. What really caught your eye was the artwork.

Decorating the walls of the room were portrait after portrait with a rather unusual theme, foot worship. In each picture there was some poor bastard in a compromising position kissing or licking at a woman's feet. Some even had collars or cock cages on. Upon closer inspection though, you notice some familiar faces.

You recognize that phoney fortune teller as the woman being worshipped in several of the portraits. Some of the others had Bunny from out front as the woman in charge. The last woman you saw was some hot blonde chick that you wouldn't mind visiting next. Perhaps this place doubles as their home, and these portraits depict the poor souls that couldn't get out in time.

Snapping out of your trance, you remember that you're being timed and that you just spent three minutes just admiring art. You notice two sets of stairs, one going up and one going down, as well as a large door leading on to the rest of this floor. Well, time's of the essence. Which way should you go?
11111.title: You explore a bit

choices: The Master Bedroom
The Kitchen
Somewhere else
111112.content:
Well, it's a safe bet that the ground floor has the most room to search. If you are going to find this key, then you'll need to search as much as you can as fast as you can. Ignoring both sets of stairs, you head through the large doors. You then see a large hallway with branching halls and doors.

Just like out in the main room, the walls of this hall are covered in portraits of the three ladies and their conquests. Just how many poor souls have walked these halls before you? How many couldn't do what you are trying to do? Do you even have a chance at surviving this, let alone winning the grand prize?

No, you can't be thinking like that right now. You needed to find that key and get the fuck out of here before you faced the same fate as these guys, maybe worse. Negative thinking was only going to play you into their hands. You are down to fifty five minutes now, so you needed to start looking if you ever wanted to get out.

The only problem was, there were a lot more rooms than you were expecting. There were about two dozen doors in this main hallway alone. You still had the side halls and the up and downstairs to search. It could take the full hour just to go through half of this floor.

It then occurs to you that there could be even more than just three floors. If their trickery could hide the true size of this place on the inside, then who knows how many floors this place could have that you couldn't see. Only now do you fully realize how utterly fucked you are now. Well, it's too late to go back now, you had to start somewhere.

You pick a door and open it to see...
111112.title: Continue on this floor

choices: A... classroom?
A... wedding chapel?!
Something else
1111123.content: What's behind door number one?
1111123.title: Somewhere else

choices: A dungeon
Same as before
You get knocked out by someone
111113.content:
If you were ever going to find this key, you had to start somewhere. Might as well go from the bottom up. You begin your descent into the basement. You expect there to only be one or two rooms to explore, so it would be an easy place to check off the list. Only when you get down there, you see that it is a long hallway with several doors and even branching halls.

It would be a waste of time at this point to backtrack upstairs just to find out it's down here anyway. You open up one of the doors and see a mostly empty room with only a bed. Based on the sheets, you can only assume what went down in here. You quickly check the pillowcase and under the bed, being the only two possible options to hide anything, but no luck.

You leave the room and go into the next one. Same deal as before, mostly empty save a bed, cum-stained sheets, no key. Same with the next two rooms. Was every room down here going to be like this?

What happened down here? Was there just some bitchin' orgy that you weren't told about? Or was this where those three you saw upstairs took their victims from the portraits? Either way, you were in a pickle.

There were a lot of rooms here. If you explored every room down here, even if they were all like this, you would eat up all of your time. Then again, what if it was their plan to hide the key in pure monotony? You'd be playing right into their hands as you could possibly skip over the key on trying to save time. Seeing no other option this far in, you stay the course and open the next door.

What's on the other side?
111113.title: Head down to the basement

choices: You try to save him
You keep moving
One of the larger "pets" begins to chase you
1111133.content:
Just as you open the door, something hits you in the back of the head. You keel over onto your knees before flopping yo the floor completely. As your vision fades, you see a pair of feet standing before you. After that, you quickly black out.

*****

As your consciousness returns, your groggily arise and begin to observe your surroundings. You see that you are standing in a room you don't recall from your previous exploration. Before you can fully question where you were or who slugged you, more of the lights turn on. Now you see a man, bound by straps and hanging from the ceiling.

You are about to call out to him, when you feel your wrist vibrate. Checking it, you see the watch that Bunny gave you, only instead of the countdown clock, you see the hostess herself staring at you on a screen. "Hello Ethan." She says.

"Bunny? How do you know my name? What's going on here? Where am I? Who is he?" You ask rapid fire.

"Slow down sweetie. I told you, I'm a goddess, so of course I know your name. You are currently in my little fun room. I want to play a game with you." She answers.

"And what about him?" You ask, gesturing to the man who was beginning to stir.

"That's Rob. He's an office worker who will also be participating in our game. Like you, he hates feet and has a smug superiority complex towards women, so some of his coworkers decided to bring him to us to show him his true place at womens' feet." She explains.

"Say what?!" Rob calls out, apparently having heard her.

"Hush now Robbie, you'll want to hear the rules of this little game too." She says, silencing him. "Now then, beneath Rob, you'll notice some of my... pets." You both look directly underneath where Rob is hanging and you both nearly vomit at the sight.

It was a vat full of feet. Yet somehow, despite being without bodies, they are still wriggling around, sweating up a storm. "Once this call ends, Rob will be lowered into that vat, where he will then be forced to sniff, taste, and hump feet until he's a worthless little footboy, whether he wants to or not." Before Rob can curse her out, she continues.

"Now now Robbie, you can be saved. That's where Ethan here comes in." She continues, turning back to you. "All you need to do is hit that button over there." At that word, another light flicks on, showing a button as promised.

But it also showed another nauseating sight. More feet like the ones beneath Rob, only these ones are as long as the average human is tall. There were about half a dozen of them, and they stood between you and the button. "All you have to do is get past my pets and hit the button before Rob enters the vat. Be careful though, they are feeling really friendly today."

You shudder at what that could mean. "Oh, and don't forget that you're still on the clock Ethan. Exit's over there for you." She motions over to an open door. "Good luck." With that, she flicks off and the watch's display returns to the clock, now showing that you have about 45 minutes left.

True to her word, once the call ends, Rob begins to be lowered into the vat. "Oh shit! Listen man, I don't know you, but you sound like my kinda guy. Help me out here, please. I don't want to be the foot toy to some of the bitches back at my work. Please." Rob begs.

You're torn. Being a foot hater yourself, you wouldn't want to subject this man to that. But, to save him, you'll have to go through your own foot suffering. Plus, you don't have time to waste. You have to find this key and escape the mansion before the clock runs out. Do you really want to go through this Saw shit for this guy you don't know?
1111133.title: Would You Like to Play a Game?

choices: Bunny's pets - all aiming for you!
It's exactly the same room again...Buny and Rob are both there!
Someone else...
11111332.content:
Even though you can empathise with the unfortunate Rob, deeply hating bare feet and all, you've always figured that it's a dog-eat-dog world...

"Sorry bro," you tell him with a shrug. When he protests and curses at you, you ignore him, focusing instead on Bunny's 'pets'. Shivering with disgust and fear as you take a final glance at the human-length feet, heading rapidly towards the open door. There is no chance in hell you can consider getting past those nightmarish things!

This is definitely not right, you tell yourself. Something or someone is messing with you...and it all goes back to Goddess Sasha! Those pictures of her on the wall can't be just a coincidence...

"Please...please...help me!" Rob shouts desperately as you turn around him to see him slowly descending upon the writhing, sweaty mass of bare feet. Jeez, the entire room is intoxicated with such a cheddary, vinegar-like stench. You have to get out!

"Help me...I can smell them...they're flooding my nostrils...I'm gonna be face first into them soon. I haven't... I haven't got....loooong!" Rob screams at the top of his lungs while you tun back around, take a breath of the foul air and stick with your decision.

Although you can't help but feel a little guilty to leave Rob, he is a total stranger to you - you reason. It's for the best! Heading through the door, you feel a wave of relief to be rid of those horrible pets of Bunny's. Jeez imagine having to lick or hump them like Rob will have to...

Standing still in total shock, you stare open-mouthed at the sight in front of you...

What the...?! How is this possible?!

Who or what is in the room?!
11111332.title: You keep moving

choices: Someone you know!
Hermione from Harry Potter!
Someone else!
111113323.content: Who is in the room - someone you know or a celebrity?
111113323.title: Someone else...

choices: Your former bestfriend Laura
Celina and Yasmine your twin cousins
More people you know
1111133231.content: It was someone you know in the room, but who
1111133231.title: Someone you know!

choices: Go with it - relax and enjoy this fantasy with Hermione!
Something must be wrong...go back to the previous room!
1111133232.content:
"You made it - my muggle hero!" Gushes an absolutely gorgeous woman with dark-blonde hair, wrapped in a black wizarding gown and lying on a four-poster bed.

"Hermione?!" You nearly shout out, cursing yourself for your stupidity at once. "I mean...I mean...Emma Watson?"

She giggles at you. "Who's Emma? No, you were right first time, actually. Now, you must be the muggle who has bravely fought through the mansion and is here to claim his reward!"

What the hell is going on? Hermione from Harry Potter is one of your absolute major crushes. How could this crappy carnival have managed to get Emma Watson to take part in this Haunted House experience?! No...no, surely she must be a very good lookalike...

She cocks her head to one side, eyes shining brightly and an amused expression on her face. "Well, it's all rather simple really. All you need to do is pop along over here and watch me take off this dreadfully annoying gown. Can you do that?"

Lookalike or not, it's totally uncanny! She looks exactly as she did in Deathly Hallows Part 2 - the final Harry Potter film. Your feet moving before you even decide to, "Hermione" giggles at your uncertainty. "Don't be so shy...I mean, I know I'm a rather loquacious sort and all, but a little enthusiasm would certainly not go amiss!"

"I...I mean..." Come on Ethan, this is a fantasy come true! "I mean, sure. Wouldn't Ron mind though?"

She giggles at the mention the name, her nose wrinkling in such an adorable way. "Ron? Oh, don't you worry yourself about him. It's just you and me. Now...." She shuffles into position, holding her arms out as if going through security at an airport. "Robes removed now, please!"

Your heart beating faster than a drum, you cannot believe this is happening! Maybe you're still dreaming? No, this feels real, for sure! Slipping off the wizarding gown is like cutting a hot knife through butter. Gulping and trying not to let your eyes bulge out of your head, you let out a an audible gasp at the sight. Hermione in lacy black bra and panties! This is actually better than your fantasies!

"Wow...I mean...what is. Are you really Hermione?" You finally blurt out, confused but getting increasingly turned-on and light headed by the second.

She pouts at you sympathetically, seeing that you're struggling with the situation. "Oh dear, not the brightest spark are we! OK, tell you what - let me show you..."

With that the beautiful eighteen year old whips out a wand from under her pillow, fixing you with a confident stare. "Wingardium Leviosa!" To your amazement, her wizarding robes suddenly float in the air and hang their suspended. Moments later and with a chuckle, they drop to the floor. "Well, that was an easy one. You know that I've got tons more!"

Mouth hanging open in disbelief, you have a sudden thought. This is all connected to Goddess Sasha...! The dawning realisation would set in more fully, if were not that you were standing before Hermione Granger in her lingerie! This was no lookalike, not even Emma Watson but the actual Hermione character!

So, if this is a trick, a trap then you are falling right into it! Maybe you should go back and help that Rob guy...maybe he is a much-needed ally that you can still help! Alarm bells should be ringing louder than this, yet this is a dream come true for you.... What do you do?
1111133232.title: Hermione from Harry Potter!

choices: One of Rob's coworkers
New Game
Something else
1111133233.content:
How about one of Rob's coworkers?

Or maybe another "game" room from Bunny?
1111133233.title: Someone else!

choices: You
James
11111332332.content:
As you walk through the door, you see another unusual-looking room. This one is still mostly empty with another door, but now, there's a glass wall splitting the room in two. On the other side of the wall, you see another man standing there. Before you could ask any questions, the door behind you slams shut.

Your watch vibrates once again and you raise it up to see Bunny giving you a smug grin. "Hello again Ethan. I see you chose survival of the fittest. Tough break for Rob then." She says, making you wince again as you are reminded of the state you left the poor guy in.

"What's going on here Bunny? I played your game, so why am I still trapped?" You ask, getting a bit frustrated. She giggles a bit at how you try to act like you're in control here.

"Did I ever say that there was only one game for you Ethan? I still have plenty of fun to have with you." She explains. You groan as you realize how screwed you are if this goes too long.

"So what's this next 'game' of yours? Also who's this guy? Does he hate feet too?" You ask, gesturing to the other man in his half of the room.

"Quite the opposite, in fact. Meet James. He's from the same office building as Rob, only he absolutely loves feet. While he did start at my feet like I expected, hesoon upped his game. He pounded me in a way I never expected from him. It was almost magical how good he was. And at no point did he degrade or hurt me. I guess that he's the real man between the two of you, huh?" She says gloatingly.

Ouch. That hurt in an untold amount of ways. To be told that that freak was more of a man in bed than you was an insult. Then again, he was the one that got to fuck Bunny's almost divine beauty, while all you got was a chance to throw up on her pet. Maybe he's onto something?

"So now on to your punishment. Now I have to find something to punish you for losing the game, giving up, failing a simple task, AND puking on my cute pet. I should force you to clean every last one of my pets, big and small, until they sparkle like diamonds. Or maybe I should call James back in here so my pets can make you watch and see how a real man treats a lady?" She says while you just lay there, helpless.

What does she decide?
11111332332212.title: It's too much, you give up during and drop ...

choices: With all three goddesses surrounding you
In a room with James and Rob
Somewhere else
1111133233223.content:
You know what, fuck it. This was kidnapping and holding you against your will, and you didn't have to take any of it, no matter what the so-called rules of this place were. You rose to your feet and gave her a confident look in the eye.

"Fuck you, I'm getting out of this madhouse and you can't stop me. This place is fucked up in every sense of the word, and if my guess is right, me and Rob aren't the only two this happened to either. I'm sure the police will just love to come here and count up the number of missing people you have yourselves photographed with." You rant.

Meanwhile, Bunny's expression transitioned from slightly miffed to a knowing smirk. Just as you're about to ask what she finds so amusing, the tanned sole from earlier jumped you from behind, pinning you to the ground, and getting the drop on you twice in under an hour. "I tried to be so generous to you Ethan, all you would have had to do is pick one of the two options and do it, then I would've let you go. But now, there's only one thing left to do if you choose to disobey me." She says as she walks up to you.

With your head between the big and second toe, you can see her standing over you with her hands on her hips. "Do you remember what I originally said would be your punishment for failure?" She asks with a widening grin.

You can feel your face go pale as you reflect the words she said before any foot licking started. "N-no, please! Not that. Anything but that. I'll take the first one. Just please not that!" You beg. Dignity be damned, you couldn't let that happen to you.

"Too late. I gave that offer and you spat in my face. Now my benevolence has passed." She says as she begins to leave, only to stop in front of James and give him a kiss on the lips.

"I wove you my wittle Jimmy. You did such a good job today." She says in a somewhat patronizing tone. "Come on. Let's go and leave Ethan to his punishment."

With James behind her with renewed pep in his step, the pair walk back out through the door Bunny entered from, leaving you alone with the "pet" that's currently trapping you. As you start to wonder how long it will take to get this thing's toejam out of your hair, the floor begins to open up, revealing a much bigger concern.

True to her word, underneath the floor lay another vat full of her smaller pets like the one Rob is currently stuck in. The hole in the floor grew wider and wider. Soon most of your body dangled over the hole, making you actually kind of glad that the large foot held you down, as it kept you from falling in. However, as if reading your mind and wanting to just ruin your day as much as possible, the foot on top of you hopped off to who-knows-where, leaving you to fall into the pile of sweaty, wiggly feet.

It was pure hell. You were only in for a second and you felt drenched in sweat. All their gross toes squirming around you. The worst part of it all though, was that they seemed to be actively trying to make you sick. Several of the ones near your head drummed their toes against your lips, trying to force their way into your mouth, meanwhile, you could feel even more of them grinding against your crotch, making you feel a bit ashamed as you got an erection from their actions.

The smell was unbearable. It made you want to pass out after only a few seconds. You had to get out of this. You see the edge of the vat and tried to fight your way through the feet to get there and pull yourself out. Unfortunately, you weren't even halfway there before you see a giant lid begin to close.

You are unable to make it as the lid slams shut, trapping you in the container with your assailants and their rank smell. You soon feel yourself pulled under again. Amidst all the feet blocking your airways and the lack of fresh air as it was, you soon pass out to the feeling of hundreds of the feet you hate squirming around you.

Where do you wake up?
1111133233223.title: She tried to be nice

choices: The goddesses
Some ladies here to see Rob
Someone else
11111332332232.content:
As you feel your consciousness return, you open your eyes to start to look around. "Ugh, where am I?" You say aloud, assuming that you were still alone.

"That's a good question you jackass." You hear spat out. Turning to the source of the voice, you see that Rob guy from before also waking up and sitting in a bed like the ones you saw back when all you had to worry about was finding a key. As you finish regaining awareness, you see that you are in one as well.

"The goddesses brought you to this room so that you may recover from your treatment." You hear. Both of you turn to see James sitting on a third bed. "Good morning you two."

"James, is that you? What happened to you? You just disappeared from work one day and we haven't seen you since. Wait, what 'treatment'?" Rob says as you vaguely remember Bunny saying something about these two having worked together.

"I heard about these three and how they love to have men at their feet. I decided to see if the rumors were true. I came to this carnival and looked for them, and when I did, I threw myself at them and begged them to let me serve them. Not only did they agree, but due to how respectful and humble I was, they've actually treated me very kind and gently." He explains.

"Okay, now what about that second part, the one about our 'treatment'?" You speak up.

"Ah yes, goddess Bunny's re-education chambers. They work in a manner similar to Pavlov's classical conditioning to give the subject a latent foot fetish. First, the subject is placed inside and the vat sealed. Then, the combination of unfresh air and feet soon cause the subject to go unconscious. From there, goddess Bunny's pets begin to play with the entrapped subject, inserting themselves into their mouth and filling their nose with foot scent, while others simply squirm around the exterior, covering the subject in sweat." He explains.

You feel like you were going to be sick. "Meanwhile a good dozen or so rub themselves against the subject's erogenous areas, inducing arousal. The subject's unconscious mind will then begin to link the pleasurable sensation with the taste, feel, and scent of feet." He finishes.

"So, what does that mean in English?" You ask.

"It means that if it worked, our bodies are going to get aroused by feet, whether we eant to or not, and it's all your fault you dick." Rob says.

"My fault? What did I do?" You ask.

"How about leaving me behind to get dropped into one of those things? Does that sound familiar?" He shouts.

"I was on a time limit. Plus, if I tried to save you, I could've been tortured by those larger ones you saw." You reply.

"Oh, mister big shot was in so much of a hurry that he couldn't stop to help his fellow foot hater from getting dunked in a tank of them." He says mockingly. The two of you stood up and began to walk towards each other, with James trying to keep you apart. Before either of you could throw a punch though, the door to your room opened.

Who was it?

Before you can decide, Lucie asks if she can tak you for a while
111113323322321.content:
Just as you were about to knock Rob senseless, the door to the room opens up. In the doorway stood all three of these supposed goddesses. You immediately recognize Bunny, as well as that phony fortune teller, Sasha you think her name was. The last one you can't put a name to, but you do recognize her as the blonde from the paintings.

"Now now boys, no fighting." Bunny says, causing both of you to stop. "Good. Now then, all of you line up, on your knees."

Rather than risk their wrath a second time, you and Rob do as you were told, with James kneeling next to you. The goddesses approached, as each one passed the freak, they gave him a kiss on the forehead before they all stopped in front of each of you. The blonde stood in front of Rob, Bunny in front of James, and you had Sasha's mug with the wifest grin possible staring you down.

"Y-you! I remember you. You promised that we would fuck on the ferris wheel, only to knock me out before I even got my pants off." Rob spits to the blonde.

"Guilty as charged. Your little lady friends told us that you wouldn't turn down a chance to act like a pig. By the way, it's Goddess Lucie to you know." She responds. "And we'll be having a lot of fun with you two." She says, pointing to him and you.

"I wish I could ladies." Bunny says as she lifts up James. "But I promised Jimmy here an all access tour of my body for being such a good boy in breaking Ethan. So we're gonna go if you don't mind."

Without waiting for an answer, she leads a smiling James out the door and closes it, leaving you and Rob alone with the two remaining goddesses. Sasha leans down and whispers in your ear. "Just think, if you submit to me now, we can have a relationship like they have."

A tempting offer, but you knew that part of their "relationship" involved the man being a whipped bitch to the woman and even licking her feet if she so wanted. Thrn again, he hardly seemed mistreated, maybe you should give up now and make things easier for yourself. Maybe you can even get something out of this.
111113323322321.title: The Goddesses Return

choices: You try to save him
There's nothing you can do
111113323322322.content:
Just as you and Rob are about to come to blows, the door to the room opens and three women walk in. One blonde, one brunette, and one Latina. Your eyes unconsciously drift down to see that all three of them were barefoot. Their entrance caused Rob to lock up. "No, not them." He says.

"Surprised to see us Rob? Or should we call you foot slave?" The blonde asks mockingly. As the three pass by you and James, the brunette stops when she sees the freak.

"Oh my God, James?! Is that you?" She asks. Them knowing both of these two leads you to believe that they work at the same place they do.

"Hey Candice. Yeah, it's me. This is where I ended up after I disappeared." James replies.

Both this "Candice" and the Latina throw their arms around him in a hug. "It's good to see you chico, we were worried about you." The Latina says.

"Thanks Helena. But I thought you three hated my guts?" He asked. This time the blonde spoke.

"No no no James, we liked you. You actually treated women with respect, so we respected you back. It was this self-centered slimeball that we hated." She says, pointing to Rob.

"Good to see your just as bitchy as always Denise." Rob snarks back. Finally, one of the trio takes notice of you.

"And who's this guy? New friend of yours, slave?" Candice asks.

"I'm Ethan. I'm currently being held here against my will and need help. Can you get me out of here?" You ask.

"Sorry new footboy, but if those three are holding you here, then that mean that your attitude towards women is no better than his," Denise says as she points to Rob, "so you belong here."

"Now that introductions are out of the way chicas, I believe that we came here for a reason. That reason being to put our new slave in his place. The goddesses said he's ready for us now." Helena says.

"Thank you Helena, I almost forgot. Alright Rob, let's see if you're as broken as they said you were. Crawl over here and kiss my feet." Denise orders.

You see Rob struggling, fighting something, but he was losing. Soon, despite his protests, his body found itself on it's hands and knees and began crawling to the giggling trio. With a grimace look and quivering lip, Rob regretfully plants a kiss on Denise's foot, causing all three to erupt in laughter.

"Yes yes yes. He's broken alright, and the best part is that he still seems to be suffering through this." Candice says.

"Indeed. Come on ladies. Let's take our new pet back, shall we?" Denise says as she grabs Rob by the shirt and begins to pull him out the door with her friends behind her. As he passes you, he gives you a pleading look, as if he was silently asking you to help him.

Do you though?

Stay silent and let them leave
Attack now
1111133233223221.content:
Common sense be damned. You already let this poor guy suffer at the hands... er, toes of those pets. You weren't about to let him be a foot slave to these chicks no matter how hot they were. "Hey! Stop right there!" You call out, making the trio turn back to you with less-than-pleases looks.

Candice steps up. "Oh really tough guy? Do you really think that you can take on all three of us at once?" She asks. "But I'll tell you what. Since you gave us a good laugh, we'll be a bit reasonable about this. We aren't blind. We can see you glancing at our feet, which means those three already broke you like they did him. So here's the deal for you. If you want to save your new BFF Rob, then all you have to do is kiss all of our feet, and we will go talk to those three about trading Rob for you. Does that sound fair ladies?" She asks, getting nods of approval from Denise and Helena.

"Otherwise, you can just stand there dumbstruck while we go about our business. Unless you actually want to go through with that little plan of fighting us." 1111133233223221.title: Trying to save Rob

Laura leads you straight into a trap.
The two of you get lost.
11112.content:
The floorboards creak as you make your way further into the horror attraction. Looking around you can already tell something weird is going on. The place has a huge opening hall lined with doors and in the center, are stairs leading up to a balcony on the upper floors.

A terrified scream suddenly fills the air and you jump in surprise. That didn't sound like a recording, and it was... oddly familiar. Curiosity getting the better of you, you head over to where you think you heard it coming from.

As soon you open the door, something crashes into you and knocks you to the floor. A head of black hair fills your vision as a trembling woman with glasses lays on top of you.

It takes you a bit, but you eventually recognize her. "Laura?" you ask as you sit up. The woman in question jumps to her feet in shock, as if she hadn't even realized she was on top of you.

"Ethan!?" she replies hopefully. That proved it; this really was Laura, your old gaming buddy from back when you were a nerd.

"What happened? Are you alright?" Concern fills your voice as you get to your feet. Laura's answer is to hug you in a death grip, as if you'd vanish into thin air if she let go.

"Oh god!" She blurts out as tears begin to stream down her face. "I-I got lost in all of the-these weird rooms and, and, and then this thing started chasing me!" You return her hug as she cries into your shoulder.

The two of you stay like that until she finally calms down. A look at your watch reveals that you still have 50 minutes left, but a glance at Laura's shows she only has 30.

"L-Let's get out of here." the terrified girl says as she grabs you by the wrist and begins dragging you deeper into the Haunted House.

You go along with out a word. Even you can admit to yourself that you could be a jerk sometimes. But you couldn't leave Laura alone in a place like this. Not after see how badly it was getting to her. You remember that she used to love horror games, but they never shook her up like this.

Even if you hadn't made up your mind, your body seems to move on its own as your feet fall into a brisk power walk over to this little hottie. She giggles watching you basically run to her!

"Hihi, welcome to the wheel of fate game good looking! Fancy a spin?" she says, diving straight in.

"I would doll face, but I have no idea what this game is, how it works or what's involved" you say, flirtatious but suspicious.

"Well", she explains. "You see these three wheels? These are called the Wheels of fate. The first wheel is the wheel of desire, where you have the chance to win a pleasurable prize..."

You look at some of the options on the Wheel of Desire... "Make out with Goddess Bunny", "BJ from Goddess Bunny", "Fuck Goddess Bunny"... Woah! This wheel is incredible! This is the one you want to spin, for sure. You only have one question, but you're pretty sure you know the answer...

"And who is Goddess Bunny?"

"Why that would be me sweet", she says with a wink. Oh boy!! She continues... "The next wheel is the Wheel of Chance. This wheel give you desires, but also less fortunate consequences, so it could be very good for you, or very bad!"

You look at the Wheel of Chance and notice that it includes some of the same options, like a BJ and making out with Goddess Bunny, however some of the other options seem quite odd. 'Tribute $50 to Goddess Bunny', 'clean Goddess Bunny's Feet', 'spend 10 minutes in Goddess Bunny's torture stocks'... Looks a bit sinister... But with the chance of getting a desire fulfilled, could be worth the risk!

“And the last wheel! The Wheel of Mystery..." she says, her tone becoming more creepy as she gestures to the final wheel. As you look at it, you immediately notice something.

"Goddess Bunny, this wheel is blank?“ you ask, confused.

"That's the point sweety, see, if you play this wheel you have no idea what you Wi get until after you spin. It truly is a mystery. It could be anything" she says, seeming to put emphasis on the word anything.

"Well obviously I choose the Wheel of Desire" you say without hesitation.

"Ahhh, great choice! That will be $500" Goddess Bunny says, extending her hand.

"What?? No way!" you reply angrily. "That's ridiculous. I'm out of here, what a rip off"

"Well perhaps you would be more willing to play the Wheel of Chance, it is only $20 for a spin" she says.

Your ears perk up... $20 is a bit pricey, but not too bad considering some of the prizes you could get. Although you don't exactly like the idea of paying $20 only to land on cleaning Goddess Bunny's feet or spending 10 minutes in her 'torture stocks', whatever that is.

"Or, if you're really strapped for cash, the Wheel of Mystery is only $1" she says with a wink.

You don't like the sound of that last wheel, but you are keen to play... I mean, any chance to have a crack at Goddess Bunny is worth a go right?

"So what will it be big boy?"

What do you do??
