111221.content:
You walk over to the Gotham archway and immediately Alfred and Detective Gordon spot you and approach you. This should be funny!

"Thank God sir, I wondered where you had been. We have a serious situation" Alfred says calmly with an undertone of panic.

"Hahaha, oh wow, you even sound like him!" You reply with a laugh. He looks at you strangely.

"Sir, I don't understand?" he says to you. You have to give him credit, he is really dedicated to his role. You decide to humor him and play along.

"I mean... Alfred, yes, I am here. What is the situation", you reply, dropping your voice a bit to try and sound more like Bruce Wayne.

"If I may, Ethan", Detective Gordon interrupts. "It's Poison Ivy. She has amassed a group of all female villains to attack Gotham simultaneously and we can't stop them. She has recruited super villains I have never even seen before, some with incredible powers.If we don't do something soon, Gotham will fall. We need you, Batman!"

Wait, did he call you Ethan? Then Batman? You have so many questions... How does he know your name is Ethan? What is this attraction? This is an incredible sales pitch, and it is working! This sounds fun!

"Okay okay, how much is this?" you ask, getting out your wallet.

"Sir, this isn't about money, we need your help!" Alfred says, his calm tone vanishing.

"What do you mean? Do I not have enough money for this?" you ask, holding up your last $10 bill. "Not to worry, let me check my bank account"

Alfred looks utterly confused as you pull out your mobile phone and quickly log into your banking app. You freeze in complete shock. No way... NO WAY! You can't believe you eyes, as you blink a few times... You refresh the app... You rub your eyes... This is IMPOSSIBLE.

Your banking app says you have $578 BILLION DOLLARS...

"Did you do this?? Is this a trick? Oh my god.... I.... I am a billionaire?!?" You stutter in disbelief.

"Sir, of course you are. You're Ethan Price, Gotham's wealthiest citizen. But with all due respect sir, Gotham does not need Ethan right now. It needs him", Alfred says definitively, gesturing towards the archway.

You look over and see a real life replica Batman suit, in your exact size. You are so impressed that real or not, you can't help but to move toward the suit. The way you see it, if they have hacked your bank account and know your name, it would be foolish to run away knowing they have this access to your life. You need to find out more if that is the case. On the other hand, if it is a part of the attraction, this is so amazing how could you not give it a go??

You walk into the suit and it immediately starts to close in around you. You feel an insane boost in self confidence as your body seems a assimilate to the role of the man you have idolized your whole life. You feel bigger... Stronger... Faster... Smarter... Hell, you feel like you know multiple fighting styles. This is incredible! The archway opens, revealing the city of Gotham!
111221.title: I'm Batman!

choices: "Well well, if it isn't B-man" Harley Quinn taunts
"Finally arrived Batman? Care for a kiss?" Poison Ivy says seductively
"Batman, thank god you're here" Detective Gordon says to you
1112211.content:
This feeling of power is incredible. As you walk through the archway to Gotham, you wonder if this is some kind of illusion, or if the suit is designed to make you feel this way. But somehow this all seems... Right... Everything, from the billions of dollars in your bank account to the insane strength that is coursing through your veins. It doesn't feel like a dream or a fantasy. It feels like you're reality.

You turn back to see Alfred and Detective Gordkn but you're shocked to find they are gone, replaced by more of gotham. You realise you're actually looking down from gotham from a rooftop. You spin in a 360 and realise you are indeed on a rooftop and the archway is completely gone. In any normal situation you would be freaking out right about now, but you stay calm. Because you're BATMAN!

With a scary confidence, you step to the ledge and leap off, free-falling to the ground at an accelerating pace. As the ground comes up to meet you, you spead your arms, engaging the bat wings and you feel the wind pick up under you, carrying you forward into a graceful glide. You can faintly hear on lookers saying things like 'look, it's Batman' and 'hey, isn't that Batman?'. Eventually you land on the floor only to be greeted by a voice...
1112211.title: I'm Batman! Let's do this!

choices: Wake up!
11122111.content:
“Wha-?”

You turned around at the sound of the familiar voice, only to suddenly be smashed right in the face with a blunt object.

Nearly tripping over your boots, you just barely catch yourself on your palms and knees before the ground can meet your smarting face all the way down.

Sorely touching the now throbbing bruise on your exposed cowl with your gloved hand, you remarked bitterly to yourself, “Well, should’ve seen that coming?”

Then, you heard her voice.

“That was for Mistah J, Batbrain!”

Looking up, you first noticed the oversized wooden mallet that she was wielding with both hands, the sheer diameter nearly taller than her.

And the woman carrying it, was a completely different story.

Dressed in her traditional jester’s outfit with alternating red-and-black colors, Harley Quinn blew you a raspberry with her beautiful face painted in her usual white clown makeup.

Possessing a slender and athletic figure, she looked about as dangerous as she was utterly and completely insane.

However, perhaps by some machination of that bitch Goddess Sasha, she was also completely barefoot.

Naturally cringing at disgust at her dainty feet pressed down on the floor of the alley, you quickly refocused your attention towards her signature weapon.

“Quinn,” you growled up at her, imitating the gruff tone of the Dark Knight as best as you possibly could.

“Oh, you remember me?” she mocked you, tilting her head to the side playfully, before suddenly sneering, “Let’s see how well you remember Mr. Hammer!”

And on that much less playful note, she lunged at you with her hammer swinging towards you.

Whoa! Instinctively jerking backwards before the painted head impacted your cowl yet again, you relied upon pure muscle memory to evade her next attack.

“Stay still, bug!” Rearing back, she aimed her next swing at your midsection, just barely grazing your armored torso before ultimately impacting the nearby dumpster with a metallic thud.

Remaining on your toes, you reached down into your utility belt, and producing a steel Batarang in one hand, aimed it towards the handle of her weapon.

“This ends now!” Taking aim, you hurled the projectile at her, prompting the Joker’s acrobatic acolyte to instinctively flinch and shield her face.

The Batarang flew towards her…

… and instead ricocheted against the brick wall right next to her.

“Well, that could've gone better,” you groaned to yourself, realizing that not all of the caped crusader’s skills must’ve transferred over to you.

Realizing that it had missed a second later, Quinn opened her eyes, and a bemused giggle escaped her lips.

“Wow, you suck,” she commented, before coming at you yet again.

This time, however, you were ready.

Waiting for the opportune moment, you feigned shifting over to the right, to which she predictably started to lift her mallet up to attack you in that direction.

However, in the last possible splitsecond, you instead shot underneath her outstretched armpit and reappeared on her blindside from the other side.

Raising one leg up, you brought your heel down hard on the back of her knee, forcing her down into a half kneel.

Then, as she started to raise her weapon, you struck her clean across the face with a swift left cross, putting just enough strength behind it to effectively stun, if not outright incapacitate her.

As she flopped down to the floor, you smartly kicked her mallet out of range before addressing her, “Stay down, Quinn. You can’t beat me.”

Smirking up at you, Harley’s grinning expression indicated she was far from finished.

“Wanna bet?” As she reached into her belt, your experienced eye caught a flicker of something metallic, prompting you to move backwards just before a rather large knife sliced through the space where your shin had just been inhabiting.

Springing back up with that look of utter insanity painted across her face, she wasted no time in attacking you once again.

Now much more in-tune with your newfound body, you easily ducked and weaved around her bladed jabs and slashes, only irritating the blonde criminal even more.

Almost whining out in frustration, she tried one last slashing motion after a continuous string of non-success.

Her first mistake.

Spotting the knife arcing through the air from a mile away, you reached up with both hands and seized her wrist just before the knife came even close to your cowl.

Moving quickly, you twisted her forearm behind her back, spinning her around for a second before ultimately slamming her facefirst into the nearby wall.

Cinching in a hammerlock with ease, you happily wrenched upwards on her captive arm, forcing the woman to drop the knife or else suffer severe dislocation.

“Who put you up to this?” you growled into her ear.

“Who do ya think, B Man?” she glowered up at you irritably.

Ivy.

“Well, when you see her next in Arkham, tell her that the city is still mine,” you told her firmly, increasing the pressure much to her chagrin.

“Why don’t you...tell her...yourself?” she squeezed out in between winces.

Reaching for your handcuffs with one hand, you’re about to respond when Harley suddenly lifts both legs up to the wall surface, pushing you back a few steps.

In a startling feat of agility, she literally walks up the wall until she had just enough leverage to backflip overhead and escape your vice.

Landing behind you, Harley takes just a second to steady herself as you twirl around to meet he-

“Uggghhhh…” Your head snaps to the side as she surprises you with a swift roundhouse right to the jaw, the top of her foot painfully smacking against your chin.

Staggering backwards up against some trash cans, you cradle your jaw with one hand as she even does a mocking bow.

“Betcha didn’t see that coming, huh Bats?” she taunted you.

Half of you thought that was pretty cool, and the other half just wanted to punch her again.

“It’ll take more than that to beat me,” you snarl at her, standing up with your fists clenched and ready to go.

“I know,” she chirped happily, before suddenly pointing behind you. “That’s why I brought her.”

“Ngggghghhhhhh….”

Before you could react in time, an overwhelming sensation entered your body: electrocution.

Within seconds, the flow of electricity swept throughout your armored body, filling your veins up with massive surges of pain.

You almost instantly crumbled to the ground as the overwhelming volts of electricity discharged throughout you suit, lighting up every inch of your body with a blinding pain.

It was a disorienting, paralyzing feeling that had immobilized your entire being, made worse by Harley Quinn’s mocking laughter from above.

Fuck, fuck, fuck! Too weakened to even register the clicking sound of high heels coming around your side, you could barely even breathe with your nervous system now on complete shutdown.

“How about that for a, shocking cliffhanger. Get it?” Quinn’s immature voice rang in one ear, before going out the other.

Despite your head throbbing in pain, and your vision wasn’t doing so well either, you had to know who this mysterious assailant was.

You had to-

“Should we bring him to Ivy?” the woman spoke, her true voice hidden through a masculine voice modulator.

“Nah, I wanna have fun with him first. I heard through the grapevine that ol’ Bats is all kinds of kinky,” Harley responded in a seductive purr.

You conjured up just enough strength to make out the feminine yet curvy figure, the attacker still proudly brandishing the taser.

Dressed in an all-black catsuit, she wore a mask that completely covered her facial features.

“Who…?” You couldn’t even finish the sentence, before the pain once again took hold of you.

“Not now, Bats. We don’t want to ruin the surprise.” Harley made her presence known by kicking you rather painfully in the sides, forcing you back down to the floor with a groan.

With one hand perched on her hip, the masked woman merely looked on as her apparent partner-in-crime continued to taunt the downed Dark Knight.

“While I’ve got you down there, what do you think of my new pedicure?” Harley teased you, proudly presenting her bare feet and sleek black painted toes before your grimacing expression.

Barely able to verbalize your contempt for being in such proximity with a woman’s bare feet, you simply stare at the woman, curious even in your current state as to her true identity.

“Yeah, I got these piggies done just for you. Mistah J never did pay much attention to ‘em but- hey!” Realizing where your true attention was at, Harley grabbed you by your artificial ears and forced you to stare at her wriggling digits. “Ya better get used to seeing these bad boys up close and personal, Batman, ‘cause you’re gonna get real acquainted with them real soon.”

A little bit frightened by her ominous tone, you continue to stare down on them, oblivious to the mysterious woman raising her booted foot up above your head.

“Nighty-night, Bats!”

A second later, her boot connected with the back of your head, rendering your world black.
11122111.title: "Well well, if it isn't B-man" Harl...

choices: "those are the pheromones of Pamela Isley. Poison Ivy killed these men"
"Formaldehyde and phosgene. That would be... Poisonous toe nails??"
"........."...... Alfred? Where did he go??
11122113.content:
"Detective Gordon" you greet him, as if you have known him for years. You fall so seamlessly into the role of Batman it's almost as if you have always been the caped crusader.

"Three bodies, but no signs of trauma on any of the victims that any of my men could see. No bullets, no blood, hell, no visible marks", Detective Gordon informs you, a tone of mystery in his voice. "I'm not used to this type of murder scene in Gorham. I used to brutality... I don't know what this is."

"Detective, just because there are no signs of brutality doesn't mean there was none", you say with confidence. "Can you give me a moment with the crime scene?"

“Of course", Gordon says, turning to him men. "You heard Batman, clear out."

There are audible murmurs of disapproval from the other cops as they clear the scene. They must feel somewhat useless being told to step away and let somebody else do their job. You enter the room and just as Detective Gordon described, you see three bodies laying motionless on the floor.

"Sir, I'm detecting three bodies with vital signs showing no pulse and no breathing. I'm unable to detect any signs of life now that the room has been cleared", Alfred's voice reports into your left ear.

"Thank you Alfred. Switching to thermal scanner now. Let's see if anything touched these men", you say as you think out loud. The thermal scan should show any traces of residual body heat on surfaces, concluding their bodies. As the scanner comes active, a shiver runs up your spine. It appears the bodies have foot prints all over them.

"They..... They were trampled?" you ask yourself out loud.

"Sir, if I may", Alfred interjects. "If they were trampled there would be signs of blunt force trauma on the bodies."

"So that means... They had feet on them, but not attacking them", you confirm. This seems to raise more questions that it asks.

Looking around the room you cannot see any signs of the individuals being subdued. You can only come to one of two conclusions; either they were forced to lay down at the feet or whoever attacked them using a non-physical method like being held at gun point, or being blackmailed, or possibly even seduced. But the foot prints do not answer the question of how these men actually died.

You remove a gadget from your belt and flick it open, aiming it towards the air as you now scan for any abnormalities in the air.

"Alfred, are you seeing this?" You ask him, as you see a very peculiar reading.

"Yes sir, I do indeed..."
11122113.title: The Crime Scene

choices: "Well done Batman, yes, Ivy gave me her pheromones" the mysterious voice says
"So you think I had something to do with this?" Poison Ivy asks you calmly
"Or maybe they were just obsessed with my feet?" the mystery voice replies.
111221132.content:
"That's right Alfred", you confirm. "Formaldehyde is a chemical used in nail polishes that harden, and phosgene is an extremely deadly chemical when inhaled. If these men were close to nails that contained this mixture for too long, it would render them paralysed and then, eventually, deceased."

"Yes sir, but that still begs the question. Why were these men exposed to feet to begin with? It appears they didn't even out up a fight", Alfred asks you.

"Well, who do we know that is a a doctor, an expert with chemicals, and can control men with her pheromones?" You ask Alfred rhetorically.

"Of course, Poison Ivy" Alfred repeats.

"That was my first suspicion too... But something doesn't add up", you continue. "Poison Ivy has unique pheromones that would kill a man on their own, they are natural to her, they're in her blood. I have collected samples before, so I have them on file. They are nothing like this... She wouldn't need to depend on phosgene to kill a man."

Alfred remains silent as your response transitions from an answer to you talking to yourself to figure this out.

"The willingness of the victims to have feet all over them would point to infatuation, which was more than likely chemically induced. This means Poison Ivy was most likely working with whoever did this", you deduce.

You bend down to a victim and take a closer look at the foot print identified by your thermal scan.

"Size 5 female foot... Quite a small foot. Poison Ivy is taller, her foot would probably be closer to a size 8 or 9. So we can rule out Ivy directly, however like I said", you say, continuing to sum up your thoughts. "Ivy was probably working with the woman who did this. That is the only way to explain the infatuation..."

Suddenly a female voice speaks up from behind you.
111221132.title: Mystery Afoot

choices: Take her down with your martial arts prowess!
Use your gadgets to restrain her!
1112211321.content:
The slits on your cowl widened in shock as you twirled around towards the direction of the feminine voice.

Reaching into your utility belt as a sign of apparent muscle memory kicking in, you mentally ready yourself for the very worst that Poison Ivy could throw at you.

Expecting an Amazonian bodyguard or perhaps a less known member of your rogue’s gallery, you had a Batarang already unclipped and at the ready when your eyes fell upon her.

“Hi there!” the young woman smiled at you cheerfully.

What the hell?

Standing from your calculations just a little over 5 feet tall, she was a very petite woman with long flowing dark hair and striking emerald eyes.

Dressed in a floral dress that perfectly hugged her hourglass figure, her arms and legs were bare save for a pair of crimson red stilettos on her feet.

She looked young (around your same age, perhaps?), innocent even, but remembering the bodies sprawled out around you, you reminded yourself that her actions were anything but.

“So, you’re the woman who killed these men?” you demanded, still keeping the Batarang at the ready.

“Well duh, silly!” she giggled, as if the very act of murder was something to be taken so lightly by her.

“Jeez, the freaks here are even sicker up close than they are in the comic books,” you thought to yourself in a moment of self-realization.

“A very nice lady paid me a whole lot of money to make sure they die very unhappy. It wasn’t really that hard,” she continued to tell you, her sickeningly sweet voice a serious disconnect from the severe consequences of her actions.

“You killed them in cold blood, and for what? Money? They had families, loved ones,” you growled at her.

“Too bad,” she smiled happily, infuriating you even more. “Bank account’s not gonna fill itself, sweetie. And you know, I’ve got to give to Ivy...”

Her crimson-colored lips pursed in a coy grin. “She was quite persuasive.”

Okay, enough’s enough.

“You have a name, or should I just tell the guards at Arkham to book you as Inmate #496?” you state coldly.

Twirling a strand of hair in one hand, she tilted her head to the side before finally telling you, “You can call me Evie. Short for Everlyn. And you’d better remember it, Mr. Batman. I don’t like repeating myself.”

“Good, I’m the same way.” Sheathing your Batarang, you instead produce a pair of bat-shaped handcuffs.

“I’m only gonna say this once: come with me now. You can either walk out on both feet, or the GCPD will have to stretcher you out to the precinct,” you state at her firmly, using your best “I’m Batman” tone.

Squinting her emerald eyes as if considering it, she finally beams up at you, “No thank you! I think I prefer Option C.”

Then, much to your eternal chagrin, she steps out of her high heels, revealing her dainty size 5 bare feet.

Instinctively taken aback thanks to your natural aversion to the feminine foot, you’re forced to stare at the same feet who sealed the fate of all the men laying around you.

A hot pink nail varnish adorning each toe, she clearly took care of her feet.

Remembering the destructive power they possessed nonetheless, you smartly kept your distance as she took a step towards you, a move that greatly amused the apparent assassin.

“What’s wrong, Batman? Scared of my cute little tootsies?” she taunted you.

“If I were you, I wouldn’t walk any further unless you’d like to hobble out of here on one broken leg,” you tell her, hoping that your now gruff voice would conceal the disgust you’re currently feeling.

Smirking, she began to strut on her tiptoes, testing your patience even more.

“You know, it hardly seems fair. You, in all that thick body armor and big, bulging muscles, against little ol’ me,” she cooed at you, crossing one slender leg over the other. “I figured I’d just even the odds, just a little bit.”

“This is your last warning. I...I won’t ask again,” you tell her, doing your best to keep your stoic mask up as your eyes dart frantically between her grinning expression and her potent bare feet.

Smirking, she continues to defy you. “You know, it was really easy killing all of these men. All I had to do was dress like a naughty girl, maybe tease a little…” She lifted up her hem of her dress seductively before continuing, “And they were just salivating like little doggies for the opportunity to try me out. The pheromones were just to seal the deal, really.”

You two now began circling each other, with your eyes glued to her still smug expression.

“And that’s not even the best part. See, when they really wanted to see what was underneath this cute dress, all I had to do was this,” she told you almost cheerfully, before bringing one foot up to her chest, baring her petite sole to you.

“Once those bad boys got just a whiff of my ultra special nail polish, they were all mine. And, well, I think you can guess what I did next, huh Mr. Detective?” she teased you with a knowing wink.

“Well, your games end now. I’m taking you in,” you told her heroically, easing into a defensive stance.

“Don’t make this too easy on me, sweetie,” she shot back at you playfully, before settling into a fighting stance of her own.

“Okay,” you told yourself with a sigh. “Time to see how much I still remember from those old Batman movies.”

Your move.
1112211321.title: "Well done Batman, yes, Ivy gave me her phe...

choices: Accept the bet, you'll make the shot!
Those stakes are far too high, get away from there
Try to make a new offer instead
1113.content:
You decide to head over to the carnival games. You know the guys on your basketball team would probably want to try their hand at the carnival basketball challenge! As you approach the games, you spot a basketball ring and you head over. Nobody is there! Dammit... Looks like you will have to look somewhere else. But before you can leave you hear a voice...

"Hey big boy, you look like you could handle a basketball. Care to try?"

You turn around and see a stunning young woman with bright yellow hair. You can't help but to look up and down her body, with her shirt twisted into a knot below her boobs, you can see her athletic body and smooth skin... She is beyond stunning! You see a name tag on her shirt that says Lucie.

"You wouldn't want me to play your game Lucie, I would take all of your prizes and leave you with nothing... Then you'd have to give me something else for winning", you reply with a wink.

"Ohhhh, that's naughty. You sound like you'd interested in a more..." she begins caressing her body, running her hands over her soft skin on her exposed belly. "... Serious prize.... But that would require higher stakes...."

You are almost at a loss for words. You would do anything to get with her, so of course you respond the only way any straight man in your situation would. "Name the stakes then".

"Well, you pay $50 to take 1 shot from right here", she motions to a spot on the ground with her foot, and that's when you notice... She is bare foot... You cringe slightly. "If you make the shot, we go round the back and you get me for 5 minutes"

"Deal!" you say without a second though, reaching into your wallet and pulling out a crisp $50 note.

"Hold on big boy, I didn't tell you what happens if you miss the shot," Lucie says, her mouth twisting into a sinister grin.

"There's a consequence if I miss? I have never heard of a carnival game that punishes you for losing," you say.

"Have you ever heard of a carnival game where you get to fuck the staff member if you win?" She says definitively.

"Okay, you have a good point. What happens if I miss," you say eagerly.

"One of two things, you can choose. Either you empty that and give it all to me", she says as she motions to your wallet. "All the cash, credit cards, bank cards, pin numbers... The lot"

You would never accept that, losing all your money over a carnival game with a hot girl? That's a serious bet! You're not that desperate! So you prompt her to continue. "Or?"

"Or...", she continues. "you can lick my feet clean for 5 minutes instead."

"What? No way, that's disgusting!" You say, unable to believe your ears. She wants you to lick her dirty feet clean? She has been walking around the carnival, you would never do that.

"Yep, either all your money, and I do mean ALL of it... Or you lick these beautiful feet if mine clean", she says. The last thing you would call anybody's feet is beautiful... As you're thinking, she continues. "But who cares, you will make the shot right? You won't miss anyway. Then I am all yours! So what do you say?"

You look at her body again. She is easily the hottest girl you have ever laid eyes on - even hotter than Jessica - you can't pass this up... Plus you've got a basketball scholarship, she doesn't know that you can make this shot with ease! Then your eyes shift down to her dirty bare feet again. All of your money or licking her bare feet... That's a BIG bet to make. What do you do?
1113.title: High Stakes

choices: You have no choice, you have to at least try and make the shot
Forget the bet, just drop the ball and run away!
Maybe she is right? Hear what she has to say...
11131.content:
You pull the $50 out of your wallet without hesitation, handing it to Lucie with a cocky grin.

"Don't worry, you will enjoy the 5 minutes just as much as I will," you say arrogantly, pumping up your confidence.

"Oh, you mean you will enjoy licking my feet clean too? I didn't know you were into that kind of thing!" Lucie says with a giggle.

"What? No... No I meant when I make the shot and have my way with you!" you say, getting defensive.

"Okay okay, calm down big boy. Jeez, if I didn't know any better I would say you were in denial about having a foot fetish" she says with a grin... She is trying to get into your head, and unfortunately for you, it is working.

"Alright, just for that, my 5 minutes will be more having my way with you, but with a different hole. That's right, and I'm going to enjoy it!" you say, looking at her ass.

"Is that so?" she says with an evil grin, playing with her hair. "Hasn't anybody ever told you that carnival games are rigged? You think this is a regulation 10 foot ring? You think you're really shooting a 3 pointer right now? Do you even know if that call will fit in the ring at all?" Lucie says... You confidence drops like a stone. You are speechless!

"That's right little boy," Lucie says, dropping the seductive 'Big Boy' name she had given you and talking in a much more dominant tone. "Now you don't strike me as a stupid boy. I think you knew this game was rugged, and you took the bet because you WANT to lose. Which means one of two things... Either you wanted me to take all of your money and leave you bankrupt, or you wanted to lick and worship these Goddess feet of mine!"

You don't know what to say.... Or what to do... She has a point, but you were distracted by the possibility of fucking her right? She tricked you... But now she has your $50, you have agreed to the bet, and you are holding the ball. What do you do?
11131.title: Never Trust a Hot Girl

choices: Success - you somehow make it!
You miss....time to pay the price!
111311.content:
All of Lucie's talk of licking her dirty feet has left you a little spooked and more on edge than you'd usually be! Still, you've agreed to this bet and you're not one to back down....

"I'll take the shot," you tell her in a quiet voice, which makes her smirk widen even further.

She pouts at you. "You've just sealed your fate, little boy. Go on then - give it your best."

Trying to ignore her mocking British accent and arrogant expression, you grab a ball and get into a shooting stance. Lucie's not wrong - the view is daunting...your ball looks unlikely to fit in the ring. Still, saving face, you steady yourself and prepare to take the shot.

"So all you should be thinking about now," she states matter-of-factly, "is how much money is worth not licking my feet clean? I mean, that's a difficult one isn't it...give Goddess Lucie all your money or bow down to me like the worm you are!"

Hearing her refer to herself in third person gives you a brief flashback to Goddess Sasha. That fraud did the same thing, pretty much every time she spoke!

Pausing for a moment, trying to ignore the victorious sneer on the blonde's face, you can't help but ask. "Do you know...Goddess Sasha?" You ask her with uncertainty.

A look of satisfaction sweeps over Lucie's countenance as she grins at you. "Maybe I do, maybe I don't," she replies cryptically. "Anyway, are you going to take the shot already?"

This is it. There's no avoiding it any longer! Trying to ignore the fact that there could be a connection between the two 'Goddesses', you take the shot... How does it go for you?
111311.title: Pressure Shot!

choices: No way out of this one, drop to your knees...
It's risky, but you won't surrender willingly. Take the shot!
111313.content:
"You.... I don't.. What do.... Urgh..." You sound pathetic as you desperately try to mount some kind of an argument against Lucie but you can't seem to get your mind off the fact that you kind of walked into this trap willingly.

"What's the matter boy, lost for words? Then keep listening. Do you know how the Black Widow gets its name?" Lucie asks you.

"You... You mean the spider? No", you answer truthfully.

"Well", Lucie continues. "The female spider will devour the male after they have sex, so for the male to procreate with a female is essentially a death sentence. 11213.title: Is she a part of this??

choices: "What the? Miss Stephens? What are you doing here?"
"Oh my god, is that a wrestling ring? It looks to be a WWE event"
"OK Ethan, this is your hell apparently... So where are we going?"
1122.content:
You breathe a sigh of relief as Destiny either didn't notice or simply chose to ignore your arousal. You are grateful that she didn't say anything because to be honest, you are still confused yourself as to why you would be turned on by the current situation.

"Okay, so exactly how to we find her weakness?" You say, wonder if Destiny even has a plan or if she is simply making the up as she goes.

"Well, unfortunately I don't think you would ever find it or manage to track down an answer to that question. I believe the only way to figure that out is to play along" Destiny says... She sees your look of frustration and continues. "For now, Ethan, just for now. In order to understand her, we have to play her game. That is the only chance we have to figure out her weakness. The only way out is through."

She makes sense... You hate to say it, but she's right. It's not like you can waltz up to her and ask her what her weakness is. You need to get to know her, and the only way to do that is to play along.

"OK, let's check this place out then" you say in agreement. Destiny nods and you both begin to walk in silence.

You want to say something to break the silence... Anything... You could discuss a strategy, ask about Destiny or Goddess Sasha... But you still feel awkward. A part of you isn't sure if you should have trusted Destiny, but you push that to the side. Just as you are about to break your silence, Destiny speaks up...
1122.title: "We can't hunt her yet, we need find he...

choices: Screw it - go through the gate and enjoy the WWE show!
You decide to stick with Destiny instead!
11222.content:
"Oh my god, is that a wrestling ring? It looks to be a WWE event..." Destiny remarks, causing you to stop completely dead in your tracks.

"Whoah...what the...!" You gasp in total shock as you realise the raven-haired girl is right! Only a hundred feet away or so seems to be a live WWE event, complete with a stadium of cheering fans, music.... how is this...?!

Destiny rests a hand on your shoulder. "Ethan, you're a fan of wrestling, I take it?" Taking your slow, dumbstruck nod as affirmative, she continues. "So that's why... Hey, come back!"

WWE...World Wrestling Entertainment - you love it! You've been a fan for many years, ever since you were a kid! Of course, you've not exactly boasted about that fact at school but it's always been such a guilty pleasure of yours. The fact that it's here, at The Carnival of all places...! Like a moth to the flame, you find yourself hurrying rapidly towards it, mostly oblivious to Destiny as she chases after you. The goth, Goddess Sasha...all of that seems insignificant now, compared to getting to actually watch a live wrestling show! Maybe there'll be AJ Styles, Seth Rollins.... You nearly pause for the moment at getting to see your massive crush, Alexa Bliss, there too...

"ETHAN!" Destiny cries as she flails after you, trying to grab you by the shoulder. Shrugging her off, you get to the queue, which is amazingly short. Maybe this is one of their 'hidden' shows....like a house show, which may not even be televised and isn't particularly advertised. Shrugging that thought away as you do Destiny, you begin scrambling in your wallet for some notes.

"How much, how much?" You breathlessly ask the security.

The two guys smile at you and gesture towards the open gate. "No, no - it's free for all Carnival ticket holders! Enjoy, sir!"

Free?! You were expecting at least 50, if not a hundred dollars! Wow, this just keeps on getting better.

"ETHAN!!" Destiny yells at you, her eyes wide and hair wild. "Can't you....don't you see....a free show? This is-"

"Excuse me, ma'am, but you need to go," one of the large security guards tells her firmly, grabbing her roughly by one arm as his colleague grabs Destiny's other. The two exchange a look, which is impossible for you to decipher.

"Ethan...come back...just TRUST me...!" The goth girl screams, trying to unsuccessfully wriggle free.

Standing just in front of the entrance gate, staring uneasily at the scene of Destiny struggling with the guards, you feel conflicted. A live, WWE show for free....but Destiny seems to know things - is it best to trust her and not set foot inside the WWE show? What do you do?
11222.title: A WWE show at The Carnival?!

choices: Of course it won't - go to Alexa Bliss's dressing room!
You have to check if this is for real!
112221.content:
Let's face it, when else will you get this opportunity....at The Carnival of all places! Completely disregarding Destiny, you walk on ahead, your eyes immediately darting around when you realise you are backstage!

Wow, getting to a WWE show AND just wandering around backstage where the wrestlers are, the bookers, road agents...this is dream come true!

Walking past R Truth laughing and joking with another wrestler, you think about joining them. He is pretty cool after all, but your eyes are soon drawn to someone else...

"Oh, hi handsome!" Calls out the self-satisfied, arrogant tone of none other than Alexa Bliss! The Goddess herself! "Come on over here!"

Even though your legs feel like jelly, you drag them over to where the gorgeous, petite blonde woman is sitting. A woman is painting her nails, who is abruptly shooed away when you reach the multi-time Women's Champion. You have dreamed and fantasised about meeting this beautiful woman for years. Flicking the pink ends of her hair in a seductive manner, she beckons you to take a seat next to her.

"So, you a fan of wrestling, huh?" She asks you, leaning forward after you take a seat next her. Lightly brushing her fingers against your arm, she nods, impressed. "Wow...good muscles! You know, you could be a WWE Superstar yourself!"

"Well, er, thanks!" You reply, heart racing. Normally you're good at this - charming girls and flirting with them. But in this case, with a mega-hot celebrity who you've lusted after for years...it's difficult to form the words!

Little Miss Bliss seems to acknowledge this as she cocks her head to one side and rolls her eyes. "Relax, it's OK. I get it - I'm like, this totally hot Goddess...and you're like a, well a nobody! Don't get me wrong..." She practically whispers in your ear to clarify. "I like it. I'm sick of these meatheads trying to impress me. Guys like you - good looking but not insanely muscled...that's my type!"

Can this really be happening?! Alexa Bliss...coming on to you! Trying to appears suave, you give her your best winning smile and finally find something to say. "Well, that's me. A normal guy!"

She giggles, her nose crinkling in a seriously cute way that reminds you of Casey. "So... you wanna go, y'know, in my dressing room for... A Moment Of Bliss...?"

Mouth hanging open, you can't help but gawk at her while she grabs you by the hand, and starts leading you away. Aware that the eyes of WWE personnel, wrestlers, referees and various other important people, you can't help but feel giddy with excitement. In the back of your mind, you see Destiny's troubled face; she seemed so desperate to stop you coming here...is this nagging doubt enough to stop you from getting to fulfil your fantasies with Alexa Bliss?!
112221.title: A Moment of Bliss?

choices: You decide to fight Alexa, even though she's injured!
Go for the mystery opponent!
1122212.content:
"W-wait, just hold on a second!" You suddenly blurt out at Alexa, pulling her back so that she turns around, directly facing you.

"What is it, honey?" The gorgeous blonde wrestler replies, her eyes shining with seduction. "You wanna little taste here first? Hey, I'm not that kinda girl!" She pouts at you, though you know she is teasing you.

"It's just... I need to check...is this for real? I mean, I've just come to a WWE show, got backstage straight away...met you....and you want to, well you know...!"

She sighs a little impatiently. "Hey, guy - there are plenty of other jocks that who would beg me to have a little bit of Bliss! Just accept and enjoy the fact that it's your lucky day..."

Yet, you can't get rid of the image in your mind of Destiny screaming, while struggling with the security guards. The goth was so adamant about Goddess Sasha's powers...this can't be real - surely?! The more you think logically about it, the more you start to realise - this is a trick! You also feel a surge of guilt, having abandoned your potential protector, even if she did put that image in your head of sucking Goddess Sasha's toes and enjoying it...

"HEY!" Alexa is now glaring at you, still beautiful but a certain deadliness to her. It's clear she's used to getting her own way - in and out of the ring! "You're starting to piss me off! Come with me NOW, or I'm gonna start getting tetchy!"

"It's er, don't take it personal...I..." You begin backing away from the blonde, having made up your mind that this can't be real. Going with Alexa would mean submitting to Goddess Sasha; you have to fight that fraud and NOT end up her pathetic slave!

"That's it," Alexa says, exasperated, looking around her and starting to bark orders. "Take this guy to the ring! Tell Stephanie McMahon that it's a surprise from Alexa - one arrogant, cocky jerk thinks that he's stronger and better than any other women! Let's see how he fares in the ring!" There is a general cheer from everyone in the backstage area as you're promptly picked up by several security members and WWE personnel and dumped roughly in a dressing room right by the ring.

"Hey!" You yell out angrily. "You can't do this to me!" Then you realise it - if this is all controlled by Goddess Sasha, then anything can happen! Before you know it, you're being whisked towards the ring and pushed forward to the entrance ramp, where a shower of boos from WWE fans meets you.

Alexa is already in the ring. "Here he is everyone - the man who told me that he was tougher and stronger than any woman! He said to me backstage that I was just a "Diva", and that I should "Be a valet instead of trying to wrestle!" What a jerk!" She cries out triumphantly, which causes more boos and insults to be hurled your way. This is so unfair - you said nothing of the sort! Turning back behind you, the scary security guards make it crystal clear that you have one destination to head to - the ring!

"So, my adoring fans..." Alexa soaks up a mixture of applause and jeers. Even though she is a 'heel' - a villain - the crowd generally give her a smattering of support as well as hostility, as she is so charismatic. Due to the current circumstances, they seem to be more favourable towards her than ever, and that's despite being 'the bad guy'! Compared to how's she portrayed you, she's the one to root for!

"Right, you arrogant jerk..." Little Miss Bliss states. "I've cleared this with Steph backstage. She's agreed that you get the chance to put your money where your mouth is. "Now you could fight me, but I'm sadly injured..." The crowd boo vehemently at this. "However.... Five Feet Of Fury here is gonna see what sort of man you are. You can either fight me, knowing I'm injured, or, or you can face a mystery opponent..."

Your feelings towards Alexa Bliss are starting to distort. Whether this really is a trick from Goddess Sasha or not, you can't help but feel resentful and full of loathing towards this beautiful but manipulative woman. She's turned the crowd against you, forced you into this position...what do you do?
1122212.title: You have to check if this is for real!

choices: Charlotte Flair!
Mickie James!
Other!
11222122.content:
Even though - despite her small stature - Alexa Bliss is intimidating and sexy as hell, you feel a surge of defiance as you grab the microphone from her. Of course, the crowd and boo vehemently at your action, as it simply furthers this new, sympathetic character that the gorgeous blonde has adopted.

"I'll take the mystery opponent!" You yell into the mike, glaring at Little Miss Bliss, practically foaming at the mouth from frustration. If this is real, then you're sure as hell not going to take on an injured woman - can you imagine how much you'd be despised then?! "Bring it on!" You add, which only gets more jeers.

"Ooh, as confident and cocky as ever," Alexa sneers as she snatches the microphone back off you. "Or probably just afraid of lil' old me! OK, well in that case... here is your opponent, jerk..."

The beautiful woman steps back, a wide grin on her face as familiar music starts to play...

Who is your mystery opponent?
11222122.title: Go for the mystery opponent!

choices: You're not bowing down - fight Charlotte!
Bow down to The Queen!
112221221.content:
Oh crap...it's The Queen!

As Charlotte's music rings across the entire arena, sounds of "Woooo!" erupt around the arena. Like Alexa, Charlotte excels at playing the archetypal villain, yet the crowd seem to be fully behind her, with smatterings of applause and words of encouragement. Stepping back to take in the crowd properly for the first time, you gasp in awe...there must be around fifty thousand people here! How the hell did The Carnival pull of such a....

Of course, Goddess Sasha! Cursing yourself for forgetting something so elementary, you are forced to refocus on the current situation. Charlotte Flair is strutting to the ring, twirling in her peacock feathered-adorned gown, which makes look, admittedly, a million dollars. Dropping this onto the floor, she gives you a superior, imperious look before darting to the side of the ring, pulling off an impressive forward cartwheel before swivelling into the ring, such is customary for her entrance.

You back slightly away, gulping at the athlete you are now sharing the ring with. Charlotte is not far off 6 feet tall - only a little shorter than you! Toned and with a very impressive physique, she is certainly more intimidating and more of a specimen than Alexa, to be fair. Alexa meanwhile is grinning from ear to ear, before dropping to ringside to join the commentators. Wow, imagine if this were actually being broadcast... NO! Don't forget that this is all a trick, Goddess Sasha messing with you...!

Either way, you are faced with a daunting prospect. You've seen many, many of her matches and what she can do is damned impressive. She was a major factor in the 'Women's Revolution' - since then, female wrestlers have been taken far more seriously. For you, it's more about who is the hottest - which is why you're a major Alexa Bliss fan...or at least you were before this evening!

Charlotte stands in one corner, her eyes not leaving you, an arrogant smirk spread across her high cheekbones. Finally, someone hands her a microphone.

"I heard what you said backstage...I am Charlotte Flair - The Queen! I've taken out bigger women AND men than you before, you jerk! Now, I'll give you one chance - bow down to The Queen...get on your knees like the worm you are and bow before me. Then I'll finish you off quickly and mercifully. If you don't, then I will enjoy destroying you in front of ALL of these people... WOOOOO!"

Gulping, it's hard to keep your confidence. WWE is scripted, pre-determined...it's not like you've rehearsed or prepared for any of this! Then again, in your cocky, macho way - she is just a woman....you're a tough, sporty jock! You've been in fights and come out from the better pretty much every time.... For a moment you glance back at Alexa, who is pointing to the floor, gesturing for you to bow to Charlotte, with a sneer on her face. This infuriates you but makes you feel torn at the same time... What do you do?!
112221221.title: Charlotte Flair!

choices: Give up - kiss her boot as instructed!
Refuse to...!
1122212211.content:
"OK, let's see what you've got!" You call out cockily across the ring. "This isn't same fake, staged bullshit. I can take you!"

Charlotte sneers at you as he turns up her nose, her face impassive. "Well, you had your chance, boy. It will be all the more satisfying taking you down and forcing you to bow before me. WOOOOO!" The crowd echoes the 'Woo!' call, building up to a fervour of excitement once the bell rings.

Although it is with trepidation that you begin jockeying position with Charlotte Flair, you stick to your guns. Wrestling is fake after all; she's probably never even been in a real fight! Using this fact against her, you attempt a couple of light body blows, feeling out the situation. The blonde amazon scoffs as she neatly sidesteps these, before neatly connecting you with a backfist to your shoulder.

Wincing a little but shrugging off the blow, you decide to regroup. Having been in various scuffles with other basketball players and members of sports teams at your school, you know the best thing to do is find a weakness. You must be stronger than her surely - she is just a girl, well a woman after all....

Deciding to go for a takedown, you instantly regret this; Charlotte is too technically savvy to allow you to even wrap your arms around her! Instead, she grabs your arm and twists it hard, forcing it at a painful angle behind your back. While you gasp and struggle to push her off, she walks casually forward, taking the time to show your pained face to each side of the crowd.

"Come on, give me SOME sort of a fight...!" She chuckles in your ear before lazily pushing you away, allowing you to awkwardly force your sore arm into a more comfortable position. "I guess that's just natural selection....I am genetically superior to you in every way after all..."

The smugness of the so-called Queen is too much to bear. Growling a little in anger and frustration, you proceed to rush her, which she deftly sidesteps, allowing you to crash in a heap on the floor by the turnbuckle. The crowd roar and jeer in appreciation, even showering Charlotte with applause, which is unusual considering her usual villainous character.

Strolling over to you, she extends a boot and pushes it to the side of your face, so that you are roughly shoved against the coarse material of the lower turnbuckle. Crap, this is embarrassing! You haven't mustered one single successful blow on her...she's beating you easily!

"Too easy!" The tall blonde remarks before pushing her boot under your chin, so that you feel your entire neck twist sideways, so much that it feels it could snap off! Getting tired of toying with you, she finally steps away, her arms held up in her signature 'Queen' pose  {/b}...

Smiling confidently across at you, she lets out a long "WOOOOOOO!", which again, the crowd eat up and echo throughout the entire arena. Holding your neck in pain, using the ropes in the corner of the ring to support you, you force yourself back onto your feet, even though you're feeling a little dazed. Circling one another, Charlotte is far quicker, far more agile than you; she practically laughs as she swiftly puts you into a headlock walking around with you a little, the other hand stretched out in a regal fashion towards the crowd, before throwing you hard against the ropes.

It's surprisingly difficult just maintaining any sort of speed, but you find your footing quickly, throwing yourself against the ropes, rebounding well so that you hurtle towards her. The blonde wrestler looks annoyed when you manage to duck her clothesline and instead manage to run to the other side of the ring!

Yes, this is it...time to build some momentum! Instead of running right back at her, you stop at the ropes, allowing them to steady you, catching your breath. A scowl on her face, Charlotte steps quickly towards you, attempting to twist your arm again but you manage to wriggle free and run against the opposite side of the ring.

Here we go, building some speed, time to...

The wind is completely knocked out of your sails as you are met with a forceful shoulder block from Charlotte; she shoves you with so much power that you are sent flying onto the canvas, your back hitting it hard. The crowd burst into excited applause again, with 'Charlotte, Charlotte!' chants building to a crescendo. Charlotte arrogantly struts around the ring, mimicking her own father's famous walk in homage!

Grabbing you by the hair, you yelp out in pain as she proceeds to unleash several almighty chops to your chest. Each one is met with an eager 'Woo!' from the crowd, while you stagger backwards. Charlotte then tears off your shirt, exposing your chest before chopping you again a couple of times until you put your hands up to beg her to stop. Shuffling backwards, until you reach the turnbuckle, you gingerly press your fingers against where she has lighted up your upper body with her stinging, powerful blows.

Charlotte's grin is wider than ever as she stalks towards you. Without a moment to defend yourself, she grabs the top rope with both hands, using it for leverage, while viciously choking you with her boot. She exerts so much pressure that you almost instantly drop to a sitting position. The referee didn't even need to carry out a '5 count', so quick were you to drop limply to the floor.

The Queen beckons for a microphone, towering over you, and not even showing a sign of breaking into a sweat. You meanwhile are panting, sweating profusely and aching in several places.

"This is a joke!" She says with disdain into the mike, gesturing at you. "This man doesn't stand a chance against me! Alexa, I'm sorry, but next time please find a guy backstage who actually has a fighting chance! Really, you should have bowed before The Queen before I taught you a lesson. I haven't even performed any of my signature moves yet!" The crowd find this hilarious, whooping and cheering while you struggle to catch your breath. "OK, loser. I'll tell you what. I'm going to stick the sole of my boot in front of your useless face. You need to kiss it, then I'll let you roll over like a good little puppy, so I can pin you and get this nonsense over with. If you don't, then I am going to humiliate you even more!"

Man, it would be excruciating to lose that way but do you have much of a choice? Charlotte is barely trying and is totally destroying you! What do you do?
1122212211.title: You're not bowing down - fight Charlotte!

choices: Her kick connects - uh oh!
You manage to duck just in time!
11222122112.content:
There's no chance you're being defeated that easily! Surely none of this can be 'real' - if what Destiny said is true then this is all part of Goddess Sasha's games. She wants to destabilise you, embarrass you...destroy you! Yet, this feels real alright, faced with possibly the greatest female wrestler of all time!

Grimacing at the sight of the slightly blackened sole of her wrestling boot, you feel a sudden flurry of fight spark from you. Suddenly grabbing the proffered foot and throwing it upwards, you're relieved to see Charlotte stumble back away from you, yet disheartened to see her regain her balance almost immediately, like an expert gymnast!

"Ungrateful idiot!" Charlotte has a severe expression on her face, however you can see her eyes dance in excitement. "Well, you've sealed your fate - I am going to deny you any mercy now, boy. Wooooo!"

Pushing yourself up, still aching all over but with a renewed spring in your step, you start to circle the blonde wrestler. Trying to find an opening is like hitting a moving target. She is so quick, so agile... Feeling pain explode in your left knee, you yelp out in pain after Charlotte casually stomps hard against it, causing you to trip and fall, much to the crowd's delight. Trying to ignore their cheers and jeers, you regroup, trying again futilely to find a way of outmanoeuvring her.

The Queen seems to find your attempts to fight her amusing, easily blocking any jabs you aim at her, sidestepping neatly whenever she needs to. You can tell she's holding back, which begins to shatter your confidence. Almost lazily, she suddenly chops you again on the bare chest, making you wince and groan, before sweeping you with an expertly placed leg, causing you once again to crash to the ground. It's harder getting up this time, but you still have some fight in you.

"Bet you wished you had kissed my boot when you had the chance...you're gonna be begging me to by the end of this 'match'..." She pauses and mocks you with quotation marks at the mention of this word. "Ha! You'll be begging to kiss my feet!"

The mention of the 'F' word makes trepidation melt down your spine; that's just what you need! Practically snarling, you start throwing wild haymakers... all it will take is one to bring her down, surely... But your punches are completely ineffective; Charlotte Flair laughs dismissively as she dodges your attacks before chopping you once again so that your upper body reddens. Stumbling backwards, you groan as she kicks you hard in the gut, then suddenly steps neatly back a few steps and launches off the ropes.

SMACK!

You see stars as Charlotte's boot connects squarely with your jaw; such is the force of her blow that you are sent spinning sidewards, almost flipped over as you crash unceremoniously to the ground. It takes several moments to regain your senses and be cognisant of the roar from the crowd. Charlotte's 'Big Boot' has completely crushed you! Wheezing, flapping around uselessly on the floor, you are surprised when the powerful blonde wrestler suddenly scoops you back up to your feet and allows you to stagger in agony backwards to the corner turnbuckle, once again.

Man, your jaw could be broken...you feel a swelling already forming on it, desperately hoping that she hasn't caused permanent damage to you! Despite the aching haze around you, you soon realise while Charlotte helped you up - she wants to connect again with another big boot! The Queen twirls around to the crowd, soaking up the applause and adulation. This is probably the most positive feedback she's ever received!

She stares at you from the opposite corner post, her bright eyes burning right through you. Like a bull sliding preparing for a powerful attack, she scrapes her feet behind her before yelling out with triumph, steaming forward and boot raised to slam directly into your face...

A fleeting thought pops into your head as you groggily watch her; she's so confident that you're too battered and beaten to move. If you could just duck down, this forceful attack could prove very reckless...

Are you able to drop down in time or does Charlotte connect with another big boot?
11222122112.title: Not Surrendering to Charlotte So Easily!

choices: You surrender and do what she says!
You may be beaten but you still have your spirit - refuse!
112221221121.content:
Watching on helplessly, you let out a small 'oh!' of fear as Charlotte steams in, extending her leg and smashing you in the face with more force than a cannonball with her boot! Such is the ferocity of her ruthless kick, everything seems to slow down and feel faint; you vaguely remember dropping to a crumpled heap on the floor, sucking in huge amounts of oxygen, the entire room spinning as the pain to your nose and mouth begins to slowly burn through you.

With a snap, you are suddenly aware of the crowd screaming at the top of their lungs, jumping up and down in a frenzy of excitement. Groggily looking about you, you grimly notice Charlotte strutting around the ring, a look of victoriousness pasted all over her angular face. Letting out a triumphant 'WOOOO!', things begin to get worse for you - if that were possible...

"No...no...!" You murmur weakly, putting a hand on your nose, feeling warm blood trickle down onto your split lips. Man, her big boot was so powerful, so effective. She could have broken your nose...and maybe knocked out a couple of your teeth! No, even worse than that is what The Queen is doing next... Trying unsuccessfully to pull yourself back to your feet, you stay slumped and beaten at the bottom turnbuckle, eyes wide with fear and despair at the sight of Charlotte Flair...pulling off her wrestling boots!

"I told you," she snickers, sauntering over to you in her white sports ankle socks, her eyes flashing. "You should've kissed my boot, you jerk! Now I'm gonna teach you a harsh lesson in respecting your betters..." With a disdainful chuckle, she lifts one powerful leg up, holding a socked sole teasingly over your face. It is so sweaty that you can see the clear imprint of her bare sole about to strike...

"Please...no...don't!" You whimper, spitting a globule of your own blood on the mat. "Don't....mmmmmffffff....." Your words are cut off by Charlotte slamming down her foot, with such ferocity that a fresh wave of pain washes over your already aching face; Charlotte arches back and holds the lower rope for coverage, shoving her foot forwards, so that your neck snaps back, unsuccessfully trying to accommodate the pressure.

Charlotte pulls back for a moment, allowing you to breathe momentarily, before slamming her foot down again, hard, pushing it against your face and scraping it back soon after. Your head bounces around on the mat, your body crumpling so that you're practically in the foetal position. Charlotte continues her relentless assault, her foot repeatedly slamming against your face, pushing sharply along it, pulling back over and over. Dimly, in a haze, you recall what she's doing - she's face washing you!

Face washed by Charlotte's sweaty white ankle sock, how humiliating! The sound of jeering and jubilant yelling from the crowd becomes gradually fainter, as your face is pummelled into oblivion. Letting a small moan of defeat, you try telling Charlotte that you quit, but she doesn't seem to care! Finally, she lets off, shouting something to the guys at ringside. While you roll onto your back, desperately trying to get your breathing under control, you are just about aware of Charlotte placing a steel chair in the middle of the ring, sitting in a typically elegant and imperious manner.

"OK, last chance to receive some mercy from The Queen!" She yells across at you, a totally superior look about her. "Crawl over here on your belly, like the worm you are. Take off my sweaty socks and kiss my feet! Then I will end this joke of a match!"

It's hard to tell if the crowd picked up on all of her words but you certainly did. Positioning yourself on your belly, your face turned up to meet her eye, you feel completely defeated. Are you so beaten and humbled that you're going to surrender this pathetically to her?!
112221221121.title: Charlotte's kick connects - uh oh!

choices: Agree to lick Alexa's Feet!
Charlotte's Backstage Bitch!
1122212211211.content:
It's no use! Charlotte Flair has physically dominated to the point that you're literally trembling with fear before her. There is no point in prolonging this misery; at this point all you want to do is get this over with and get out of this hell of a wrestling match! If only you'd listened to Destiny...letting your ego and stupidity lead you to this!

With a defeated sigh, you begin shuffling forward on your belly, much to the crowd's delight. Charlotte's name is chanted over and over, which she soaks up with a nod and regal wave of her hand. Usually depicted as a villain, and still with her arrogant traits - it's clear the crowd has been won over with how thoroughly she has humbled you!

"That's it! Crawl over to me like the worm you are!" She chuckles, crossing her legs and swishing her right foot from side to side. You shudder; her feet are undoubtedly sweaty - removing those ankle socks is going to stink more than anything. After what seems like a painful minute or so of dragging your exhausted and battered body along the ground, you reach The Queen, heart racing with terror as she sits above you - much like royalty over a pathetic servant.

With a smirk, she stretches out one socked foot so that it is just over your face. Immediately, the dank stench from her sweaty foot floods into your nostrils and makes you gag; she has worked up more than just a sweat! It's like actual clear vinegar running down her sports socks! Shuddering and trying to hold your breath, you begin reluctantly and fearfully pulling off ankle sock, grimacing with how wet and slimy it is before dropping it to the floor in disgust.

"And the other one!" She calls cheerily, while you bleakly stare at her long, powerful sole, glistening with sweat. Focusing your attention on Charlotte's other sock, you hurriedly scramble your hands around, yanking it off so that the powerful blonde wrester is now completely barefoot.

This is clearly the part that the crowd has anticipated the most, the moment Charlotte yelled at you from the middle of the ring on her 'throne'. Whooping and screaming with unabated delirium, it only adds to your humiliation. In the corner of your eye, you notice a petite figure slip through the ropes, walking steadily over to Charlotte's side.

Of course, Little Miss Bliss would want to witness this first hand...

"Well, this is a wonderful sight!" The petite blonde says in a gleeful tone. "If only you had not dared to question me - you could have had at least five minutes of fun with Five Feet Of Fury here!" She giggles at her own joke and pouts at you. "Well, you're gonna be getting some feet time, alright!"

Charlotte sniffs disdainfully at you, a look of malevolence flashing in her eyes as she stretches out her bare soles in front of you, forcing you to inhale the bitter aroma. "You heard her. Kiss my feet, loser. Then I will pin you and finish this nonsense!"

Even though she's speaking so dismissively to you, you're grateful to have the suffering over with. Every bone in your body aching, you lean forward and pucker up. Kissing each of Charlotte's feet is mortifying and disgusting but at least it's done quickly.

"Ohhhh no!" Alexa frowns, shaking her head as she rests a hand on her fellow wrestler's shoulder. "Nope. The Queen deserves FIVE kisses. On each foot! So Ten Feet Of Fury! HA!"

Charlotte smirks, giving you an icy stare and wiggling her toes, while you literally tremble before her. Closing your eyes in defeat, you press five quick kisses to the centre of Charlotte's bare sole, grimacing as the cheddary smell dominates your senses, the sharp, acrid flavour making you nearly wretch.

Alexa interferes again. "No, no, no! We need five SLOW kisses... Kisses to show that you are totally inferior to an awesome wrestler like Charlotte..."

"Yes, that sounds fair," Charlotte agrees, sneering at you. "And in between each kiss, I want you to say these words. "I. Surrender. To. The. Queen. Got that, wimp?"

You nod weakly, feeling both ashamed of yourself and desperate to get this ordeal over with at the same time. Taking in a breath of the sharp, bitter air around her foot, you do exactly as told, causing the crowd to shout and scream happily, louder than ever. "I...surrender...to...The...Queen..." You arch back your head to get some oxygen, your lips stinging with the salty flavour of her bare sole. "I....surrender.....to......The........Queen......" You repeat whilst kissing her other foot, being careful to make the words clear and respectful. Your mouth tasting of nothing other than cheesy feet, you lay slumped on your knees, at her feet, while she waves to the adoring crowd.

"On your back, loser," she suddenly orders you. You do so at once, relieved that this is at least nearly at its end. Just three seconds then the nightmare is over!

Alexa helpfully takes the steel chair from Charlotte, holding it in her hands while The Queen towers over you, hands on hips, and a look of triumph adorning her handsome features. You look up bleakly, wishing her to get this over with. Finally, after twirling around several times over your defeated form, she lifts up a bare foot slowly, taking her time to lower it down towards your face...

What a way to get pinned, you muse, before Charlotte's long, powerful and conquering sole covers your face. She exerts some pressure, scrunching her sweaty toes against your forehead and motioning with her other foot for the hapless referee, who has been conveniently silent for the past few minutes or so, to count the three.

"1...2...3!" The crowd roar along, each number punctuated with a tap of Charlotte's toes to your face. Finally, finally the match is over as Charlotte steps off you, ensuring to do so slowly so that you imagine her imprint has been etched firmly onto your defeated face.

"I hope you've learned a lesson, bitch. By the way, you kissed pretty well. Let me know if you wanna kiss them again!" She shakes her head arrogantly with disdain, locking eyes with you one more time before posing for the crowd again.

With a giggle, Alexa raises Charlotte's hand before walking over to you. "Wow, you were really good at kissing Charlotte's feet! I've heard that she's done that to guys before...but I bet none did it it as well as you! I'll give you a choice, foot kisser. Stay where you are, flat on your back in the middle of ring and lick MY feet clean in front of ALL of these people...or, you go backstage with Charlotte where you can be her bitch." She smirks at you for a moment. "Either way, I win - I know you're gonna be humiliated whatever you choose!"

Agreeing to be Charlotte's backstage bitch?!Then again, the alternative is to lick Alexa's feet...in front of thousands of rabid WWE fans. What do you do?!
1122212211211.title: Complete Surrender to Charlotte Flair

choices: Kairi Sane!
Sasha Banks!
Someone else...
112221221122.content:
It takes every ounce of instinct to drop down in the nick of time. Whirring towards you is a flash of blue material, tanned skin and blonde hair...letting out a gasp of tremendous effort you manage to drop down directly, rolling just enough away that Charlotte goes crashing straight into the turnbuckle!

The crowd goes silent for a moment, until a few angry remarks and calls ring out the arena. Gazing up at you, you see that Charlotte is on a heap on the floor, spitting and cursing vehemently while grabbing on desperately to her right knee. The referee attends to her, checking on her leg and seeing if there is a major injury there.

You did it, you outsmarted The Queen! Slowly rising to your feet, still nursing the now definite bruise on your chin, you glance behind you at Alexa Bliss, still sat in on commentary and with a look of disgust on her face. Giving her a cocky grin, feeling buoyed by how you've managed to get one over Charlotte Flair, you walk over to where she is still writhing in agony on the floor.

"It might...might be...broken!" Charlotte gasps in between choked sobs, while the referee signals for medics to make their way to the ring. The powerful blonde catches your eye and glares at you. "You...you...piece of shit!"

You shrug. "Hey, it wasn't my idea to come charging into the corner post like that! So, you forfeit?"

Incredibly, you've got this won. Surely! Charlotte can't even get back to her feet, let alone wrestle you! Despite the odds, and being totally outmatched by this proficient wrestler, you've put yourself into a winning position! The crowd rain down boos and jeers, but you soak it all up, starting to play the character that Alexa has portrayed you as. Cockily leaning against the ropes, you hold out your hands innocently before crouching down to say something to Charlotte.

"Want me to pin you, or make you tap out? I guess just forfeiting would make you look kinda like a loser..." Charlotte looks enraged as she tries to use her good leg to sweep you, her hands flinging futilely upwards, while the medics start to appear in the ring.

Warning them off, you easily step past Charlotte, assuring the referee that The Queen wants to continue. After the official checks, he shrugs; your opponent is so pissed off that she's not quitting yet! This is just the news you wanted. Heading back over, you stand over your fallen foe, grinning at how you're now in the dominant position. Grabbing her injured leg roughly with both hands, you drop down and apply a basic leg lock.

Writhing and desperately trying to shake you off, Charlotte screams out in agony, tears running down her usually so composed face. "Come on, loser! Tap already!" You're starting to really enjoy this! Even if this is all a facade, created by Goddess Sasha, then you're having a whale of time. You're a WWE Superstar! Even it means winning in dubious ways...

Crying out, choking back sobs, you're delighted to hear the reverberations of Charlotte tapping the ground, causing the crowd to again go totally silent until you hear the bell ring.

You've beaten Charlotte Flair! Possibly the greatest female wrestler in the world, and of all time!!

As the referee with some of returning medics help Charlotte onto a stretcher, you give her a departing 'WOOO!', which of course sends the crowd into a frenzy of hatred.

"Well...somehow this cocky misogynist has survived!" You hear Alexa over the speakers. Standing up, one hand on her hip, the other holding the mike, she tosses back her pink-tipped blonde hair. "But that's not all....no you beating Charlotte Flair as earned you another match....against...."

Another match?! You glare at her, suddenly more aware of the huge bruise on your chin, the ache of your arm...various injuries caused by Charlotte. Then again, you beat Flair so...bring it on!
112221221122.title: You manage to duck just in time!

choices: Be sporting - allow her to help you up!
Drag her hand towards you and take advantage!
1122212211221.content:
"Your opponent is....KAIRI SANE!" Alexa announces as the crowd roars with approval, chanting for the Japanese wrestler the moment her music starts.

Striding down to the ring is a petite, cute woman dressed as a pirate. Of course, the "Pirate Princess!" You've seen her wrestler in the Mae Young Classic, which she won, in NXT, which she became the Women's Champion in...she certainly has an impressive resume for someone so small! The height difference becomes even more pronounced when she makes it to the ring, removing her ridiculous pirate hat, coat, telescope and other pointless apparel. Dressed in white ring gear and posing to the crowd  , she is undeniably charismatic. Not gonna help her against you!

The bell rings rather suddenly, making you hurry into a fighting stance as the young Japanese woman beams at you. This isn't a way of psyching you out, she genuinely seems to be bubbly and excited. Yet, you feel yourself taking this opponent far less seriously than Charlotte; Kairi is a little over 5 feet tall - around a foot shorter to you and has a slight build. You know that she's fast and an aerial specialist. Deciding to go for a headlock, Kairi quickly ducks, launching across the ropes and front dropkicking your knees with tremendous force. Dropping forwards, cursing her as you're forced onto your hands, she suddenly pulls off a running blockbuster - a move that basically involves her flipping over you, using her hands to snap your face straight to the canvas!

Groaning in pain and rolling to the side, Kairi poses to the crowd, doing her telescope mime and beaming as she normally does. Wow, she does not seem concerned by you at all! As you stagger back to your feet, holding your neck awkwardly, Kairi is already on the turnbuckle! Yelling out at you, she connects with a missile dropkick, expertly connecting with your face so that you crumple to the floor, flat on your back. Hazily above you, you see The Pirate Princess do her signature 'walking the plank'. She's in no rush!

The petite woman stands over you, her smile turning to a look of pity, which only enrages you. She says something in Japanese, before holding out a hand, offering to help you to your feet!

She does seem to be a respectful and mild-mannered fighter - quite different to Charlotte in that respect! It would be sporting to accept this gesture...then again, this could be a useful opening for you...
1122212211221.title: Kairi Sane!

choices: Yes! You drop down with so much force that the leg lock is secure!
No... Kairi slips her boot off and can now slip free!
11222122112212.content:
Giving her a grateful smile, Kairi seems pleased when you extend your hand out to her. Her cute eyes soon widen with fear as you suddenly pull her towards you and wrap your legs around her waist.

"Get....OFF....me!" Kairi Sane yells out, her vocabulary compromised by both the pressure of your legs as well as her limited English.

Clenching your teeth with concentration, you block her other hand attempting to strike her and roll over. In this position, you are in control! Dropping your full weight on to her, Kairi groans in pain and futilely swings her legs around but you have her in a firm grip. Transitioning to a wrist lock, rolling her over and burying your knee into her back, you are aware of the crowd raining down boos and insults at you. Again, you don't care! In fact, you're enjoying this role - someone who can happily prove that men are stronger than women!

"Give up already?" You murmur into her ear. The Japanese wrestler is still trying to shake off your submission hold. Finally, she does, rolling over and flipping you over at a high angle so that you hurtle to the floor.

Both standing up at the same time, you stare at each other. Kairi has her 'no-nonsense face', making you back away slightly as she leaps forwards, aiming a flurry of palm strikes and back fists. You dodge a couple but wince as she plants a chop to your chest, still reddened earlier by Charlotte. She goes for a sharp back elbow, which you manage to sidestep and use the opportunity to shove her hard to the floor. Outsizing her by at least a foot and around 30 kilos, you send her sprawling to the mat, which causes the crowd to go a little hushed.

You open your arms out in a faux innocent way, grinning behind at Alexa who has her arms folded and a scowl on her face from the commentary desk. Sauntering over to Kairi, you grab hold of her right foot and begin to twirl it around, preparing the same leg lock you used to defeat Charlotte Flair! Kairi has enough heart to try shrugging you off, but your almighty shove to the mat has left her dazed and winded. Just as you start to wrap your leg around hers for further leverage, you start in surprise as Kairi suddenly begins to untie her boot. What is she...?

Of course! By removing her boot she would be able to slip away from you! It is imperative that you drop down your weight on her now before she can slip away - plus the last thing you want to see is her nasty bare foot, no matter how small it is! Are you able to complete the rest of the manoeuvre before she slips her boot off?
11222122112212.title: Drag Kairi's hand towards you and take advantage!

choices: You have another match!
She is impressed with you! Back to her dressing room!
112221221122121.content:
There's no way, no way in hell that you're going to let Kairi slip out of your attempt of the leg lock... Most importantly, you are determined not to see or smell her nasty bare feet! With a grunt, you tighten your grip and drop down with authority, forcing the Japanese woman to let go of her shoe at once and cry out in pain.

The crowd begin to shower you with boos and jeers, but you do not care a jot. In fact, it makes you even more keen to show that you're not a pushover! You defeated Charlotte Flair, albeit because of her injury, and can now put away a second accomplished wrestler! Gritting your teeth, throwing your back against the mat, Kairi begins to hold her head in her hands, tears of frustration and agony rolling down her face.

"Come on....tap already!" You yell at her. Kairi Sane is not done yet though. With a tremendous effort, biting her lip as she does so, she managed to slowly turn you over, still in the throes of the submission hold though. "Just tap! You're only gonna make it worse!"
