You continue to berate her, even though you're facing opposite ways now.

Dragging her petite body across the ring, Kairi somehow manages to make it to the ropes.

"Rope break, c'mon!" The referee shouts in your ear, tugging at your arms to release the hold. Reluctantly you do so, only to quickly grab Kairi's legs again, drag her into the middle of the ring and reapply the leg lock!

This causes a fresh wave of hostile shouts of the crowd, which you shrug off and twist with all of your might to make this damned woman submit! Straight ahead of you, you suddenly catch Alexa's face. She looks absolutely livid, a thunderous look about her as she stands up and begins walking towards the ring apron.

"That was sneaky, you jerk!" Little Miss Bliss calls angrily out at you, arms folded and shaking her head.

"Too bad!" You shout out in response, using every ounce of strength you possess to get Kairi to tap.

The petite Japanese woman though is not quitting yet. She is throwing her arms manically about, trying to pull and force you off her but to no avail. Letting out a strangled sob, she finally, with her whole body trembling, smacks her hand against the mat.

You've won another match, against two formidable women...is this all a bit too good to be true? Is Goddess Sasha orchestrating all of this, or is Destiny helloing you somehow? Or maybe the goth was full of crap and you're actually becoming a successful, if dirty-playing wrestler!

As the bell rings, you finally loosen your grip, taking in some much-needed air and allowing your aching body to recover. Shuffling your legs back, you rise to your feet, feeling the several lumps and bruises you have cumulatively taken from Charlotte and Kairi. Still, it feels so good to be this dominant! Two wins in a row! Surely Alexa will admit that you're better than she expected...that she will allow you to have some fun with her after all...

Sliding into the ring, ignoring Kairi and walking up to you, microphone in her hand, Alexa clears her throat.

"OK, two wins. And although that win wasn't so fluky like the one over Charlotte, it wasn't sporting." She smiles suddenly. "A leaf out of my book, huh? So, this is what's gonna happen next..."
112221221122121.title: Holding Firm!

choices: Zelina Vega!
Mandy Rose!
Someone else...
1122212211221211.content:
You stare at her, trying to read her body language. She seems more flirty and eager, like she did when she first locked eyes with you backstage. Just as you're feeling hopeful that you may have a bit of fun with Alexa after all, she suddenly turns her nose up in a sneer.

"Hoping for a bit of action with me, huh? Dream on buddy! No, what's best for you is to prove that you're not just a flash in a pan and have another match!" This is met with enthusiasm from the raucous crowd, who have rediscovered some hope after your second straight win.

Glaring at her, you shrug. "I've won two already. Beaten two of the best wrestlers in the world! Do you worst..."

She returns your shrug. "OK then, let me introduce...."
1122212211221211.title: You have another match!

choices: No! Zelina stomps you right in the face!
You move out of the way just in time!
11222122112212111.content:
Mexican-sounding music suddenly blares out of the speaker, causing your eyes to widen in surprise. That sounds like...Andrade?! But he's a guy! Oh...

Your feelings are a mixture of relief and curiosity. Of course it's not Andrade, it's his Business Associate, the diminutive Zelina Vega  ! Strutting confidently to the ring, you watch her with increasing excitement. This is the first of your three opponents that you've had a massive crush on! Only second to Alexa in how much you've fantasied over a female wrestler, you can't help but gawk at the beautiful woman heading towards you.

Man, the number of times you've jerked off to...

With barely a second to react, Zelina heads straight at you, throwing hard forearms to your chest from her short height - barely at five feet tall. Grimacing at her sharp contact to your chest, still lighted up by Charlotte's vicious chops, forcing you to stumble back a little. You grab her by the wrists, steadying her for a few moments. Zelina gives you a smouldering look, her nose wrinkling and eyes lighting up, which makes you practically gulp. It also proves to be a long enough distraction to allow her to wriggle free and slap you hard against the ear, deafening you briefly.

Instinctively placing a hand over your boxed ear, you grunt in pain as Zelina mercilessly kicks you in the gut, forcing you down to one knee. Slightly taller than you now, Zelina grins, a devilish smile spread over her gorgeous face as she slaps you several times over, making your cheeks sting with pain.

This is enough! Zelina is more of a manager than wrestler, from what you've seen in the WWE at least. Being the shortest of all the female wrestlers in the locker room, she's rarely talked about as being the most talented fighter. Come on, you need to get a grip and stop allowing this crush to make you hold back!

As Zelina goes for another vicious slap, you block it just in time, yanking her hand away and pushing her hard as you spring back to your feet.

The crowd boo angrily as Zelina practically seethes, shaking her head in disgust. "You dare? You dare to touch me, you jerk?!" She yells at you before running forward, her eyes narrowed in concentration.

Well what does she expect?! Before you can even prepare to defend, she amazingly wraps her legs around your neck and pulls off an incredible hurracanrana, essentially throwing your body directly towards the mat, while she flips over and is back on her feet, like a cat. Seeing stars and groaning in pain, you barely avoid a hard stomp from her boot. Pain exploding in your head, you futilely begin to attempt getting to your feet, collapsing back down each time while Zelina stomps you hard against the ribs. By the fourth stomp, you feel your ribs bruise and in risk of cracking.

Zelina pauses for breath, turning to the crowd for an excited smattering of applause and cheers. Again, like Charlotte, she is typically a villain in the ring. Against you though, she's practically a hero!

"I saw your match with Kairi..." The Puerto-Rican woman tells you, pausing to knee you in the gut. "She tried to take off her boots and you stopped her! Well, good luck stopping me!"

With a squeal of excitement, Zelina takes a step back before effortlessly yanking off each wrestling boot, revealing her small feet, each toenail adorned with black varnish.

"No...no...!" You find yourself yelling. Not her feet, not this woman who you've had a massive crush on...you can't let her ruin all that by using her bare feet on you!

The petite woman giggles. "Ooh, you've got a problem with feet, that's it, isn't it?! Oh, don't you worry - by the time I've finished with you, you'll be infatuated with my feet!" Zelina steps forward like a lioness, sensing its prey. With a giggle she lifts up a bare foot and hovers it over your face. It is slender and as feet go - not actually bad to look at. But it's still a nasty foot! Nursing your bruised ribs and various injuries from the three matches this evening, are you able to move out of the way in time?!
11222122112212111.title: Zelina Vega!

choices: Yes...she pins you and wins the match quickly!
No! She decides to make you tap out using her bare feet!
112221221122122.content:
To your horror, you find your hands slipping away from Kairi's white wrestling boot as it completely comes off! A cheddary stench immediately hits you as the boot flips over and knocks into your face. Growling with frustration, you throw the boot to one side and attempt to grab Kairi's other boot, while she is still recovering.

With a determined look on her face, Kairi uses her bare foot to nimbly swipe across the side of your face. Simultaneously, she leans forward to untie her left boot so now you have nothing to grip onto to perform your finishing move! Frustrated and angry, you attempt to pin Sane to the mat, using your greater strength to keep her shoulders in place. However, Kairi seems to sense that you're keen to stay well away from her feet, arching her legs back and wrapping her ankles around your neck.

The familiar smile is back on the Japanese wrestler's face, while the crowd start chanting her name. All you can hear is the roar of "KAIRI, KAIRI, KAIRI!" Giggling a little, she twists her body to one side, then back to the other so that you drop to the mat, the side of your face pressed against the mat. Kairi slides her feet away before hopping to her feet and standing over you.

"You not play fair!" She says with a reproachful look on her face. "You also not like my feet, huh?" With another giggle, Kairi rolls you onto your back and grabs each of your hands, pulling you towards her whilst angling her foot so it is just in front of your face.

"Please...no...!" You cry in a faltering tone, a grimace on your face as you stare up at Kairi's pale sole. It is dainty, well-cared for and if you didn't hate feet so much - probably quite attractive! Yet, you can't look away, in horror and transfixed as her foot descends and begins to slide over your face.

"Eat my feet!" Kairi shouts down to you, yanking your arms up so hard that you feel them begin to ache - the one that was twisted by Charlotte earlier feels like it could snap! The worst part though is the fact that she's rubbing her nasty bare foot in your face! Your nostrils are assaulted with a dank, cheddary flavour...her feet are very sweaty and have been kept in those boots for God-knows-how-long!This is so humiliating, so demeaning! Kairi is tiny but she has the heart of the lion; she's taken on and defeated bigger opponents before but probably not decided to rub her feet in their face!

She is so confident now that she swaps between feet, giggling and beaming up the audience who are going absolutely wild with delight. Arms aching horribly and your face covered with Kairi's foot sweat, you can only groan as she happily hops down onto your belly. The Pirate Princess puts both feet fully in your face, scrunching her toes over your nose, restricting your breathing. She's having so much fun! She even hops back up suddenly to start 'walking the plank' across your body, from your legs to your face! When she steps off your face, lingering her feet there, she poses, angling up her peds, one at a time on your face, so that the soles flick up and down, bouncing impressively on her toes. A wet dream to some foot losers watching, no doubt!

Thoroughly humiliated, you lie flat on the back, eyes closed and hoping that the torment will be over. Well, not quite. Kairi at devilish speed, leaps onto the top of the rope and prepares for her finishing move....

THE INSANE ELBOW!

All you see is a blur of cream and white before your heart nearly explodes in your chest. Crying out in agony, you barely have the strength to roll over, facedown on the mat and clutching one trembling hand over where she sharply dropped an elbow on you.

"Please....please..." You whimper as Kairi kicks you over with her foot, grinning down at you. "Please...finish it!"

Kairi pauses, cocking her head to one side, a curious look on her face. Doe she show some mercy and pin you quickly?
112221221122122.title: Kairi's Powerful Feet!

choices: She challenges you to a match - even though she's injured!
She orders you to follow her to her dressing room!
Someone else suddenly comes to the ring!
1122212211221222.content:
"You not fair fighter..." She tells you, a steely look in her eyes as she hops back down onto your stomach, as the crowd breaks into jubilant chants and applause.

Groaning weakly, you are forced once again to accept Kairi Sane's bare feet completely smothering your helpless face. For a few seconds you try to resist, but soon accept it, realising that it will hopefully speed up the humiliation. You're physically exhausted, completely beaten!

"EAT HER FEET! EAT HER FEET!" Rings out the entire arena as the chant builds to a crescendo; you close your eyes and hope that is is over soon! If this is all Goddess Sasha, then her magic is working - you're being humiliated under a pair of woman's feet, which is exactly what Destiny warned you about! Why didn't you stick with the goth girl rather than let your ego take over!

Kairi giggles as she caresses your cheeks with her dainty toes, a look of pity on her face at how easily she's dominating you now. She proceeds to slide them all over your face, clearly enjoying this. For someone who seems so sweet and mild-mannered, she's certainly not when it comes to exacting revenge on opponents!

"Well, well, well! What a pretty picture this is!" Alexa Bliss's bratty voice rings out over the entire arena. "This guy, this arrogant jock thought that he was better than me...better than women wrestlers! Well, you don't seem better than Kairi Sane, do you?' You see Alexa appear through Kairi's little toes, crouching down next to her. The smirk on her gorgeous face is difficult to watch but what else can you do! "Crushed and beaten by women's feet...just the way it should be! Jerks like you deserve to be put in their place - at the feet of women like me and Kairi! I saw - we all saw what you did to Charlotte..." Alexa glares at you for a moment as the crowd boos. "That wasn't cool and now you're getting exactly what you deserve. Who wants to see his guy kiss Kairi's feet?!"

Of course the crowd scream their approval while Kairi giggles, spreading her toes over you. "You kiss my feet," she tells you straightforwardly. "Then I will let you tap out."

It's a fair offer and one you have to take considering that you have not one iota of strength left in you. Puckering up, you press a small, meek kiss in the centre of Kairi's right sole, then the left one. Alexa tosses her head back and cackles, wiping several tears away from her eyes. Feeling sick to your stomach, you let out a small whimper as Little Miss Bliss orders you to do it again. With no other choice, you do so, doing it in fact three times for each foot, so that the flavour of Kairi's feet is lingering on your lips.

With a nod of approval from Alexa, Kairi beams at you while suddenly pushing down hard with her feet over your face, so your nose and mouth become squashed and uncomfortable. The Japanese wrestler giggles while exerting more and more pressure.

Of course, she wants a tap out. You raise your hand and pound it hard against the mat, repeatedly until Kairi finally relinquishes her pressure and steps off you, posing as The Pirate Princess while her music plays.

Alexa grins at you, a look of pure pleasure on her face. "I win!" She declares. What does Alexa want to do now?
1122212211221222.title: Tapped Out to Kairi's Feet!

choices: Accept with Destiny you can go through this
Refuse, there is no way this demon's offer is fair
Accept but without Destiny, you don't need protection from this ugly goth!
1123.content:
"Well hello, handsome", the voice of a lady came out from behind you. Destiny and you turned around to see where it came from. It was from a cutie girl with dyed white hair. She lacked a bit of shapes but her face looked pretty, it was the definition of the "petite" woman. She looked up at you, chewing a gum while smirking and remaining silent.
"Hey wassup babe?" You cockily let out, feeling lucky this woman, popping out of nowhere saved you from an embarrassing situation.
"I'm alright, do you mind following me so we get a drink or something?" The cute girl raised her hand for you to grab but Destiny intervened and stepped in front of you to face the girl.
"I see that's what I felt... You're one of them right? Cut the scene, you're not fooling anyone here." Destiny slowly speaks to the girl who answers with a cute chuckle.

"Wow, looks like the challenge might be interesting this time! One of those subbies has someone to protect him it seems!"

"I don't need protection from anyone, I can handle myself, and if you don't tell me how to stop this nightmare I'll force you to." Albeit having felt a weird tingling sensation when the girl called you a sub, you still showed confidence and cracked your fists.

The petite girl still seemed impassive, and rather amused by all of this. "Hm, it gets more interresting every second, let's play a game. I'll grant you one wish each if you manage to go through the game."

"Hmpf, and what are you exactly? A Djinn or something? ha." You smugly blurt out but realised Destiny was taking this seriously, you decided to listen to the girl too.

"Firsts things first, you'll remain trapped in this carnival as long as there isn't a winner, either you or us... You'll have to only win 5 games, but each time you lose, you get to have an handicap. You get the right to crawl back to me, and swirl your tongue around my toes in defeat to stop the challenge when you feel like it."

A picture of horror went through your head, if you felt disgusted at the idea, once again you also felt arousal thinking of it. You had to take a decision before they realise it.
1123.title: Bunny's magical challenge

choices: Her legs rise up and wrap around your head waist, crushing you like a python
She closes her eyes and a mysterious lights starts to emit from her body
She tries to make a move, but you manage to keep her pinned down
113.content:
"You seem to know a lot about this Destiny... A bit too much I think" you say, making a fist as Destiny looks at you with confidence.

"Really Ethan? You think I am the one behind this? Come on! Think about it, you saw me after Goddess Sasha, she is clearly the one behind all of this. If you think you can handle this on your own, then go. But don't think you can threaten me or attack me and I will just stand by and let you get away with it", Destiny says, looking at your fist and clearly aware that you have the intent to attack her.

You stop for two seconds to ponder your decision... She is right that she appeared after Goddess Sasha, but she knows far too much to not be a part of this. That means at the best case scenario, she is one of Goddess Sasha's minions sent to try and break you. At the worst, she is much more than that! If you walk away, she will just hunt you down later. You need to eliminate these threats one person at a time, and it starts with Destiny.

Without a single word, you dash towards her and tackle her to the ground with ease, your size providing a clear advantage as you physically overpower her. As you tussle on the floor, you of course manage to get the higher ground, pinning her wrists to the ground and her body under your ass. She struggles under you but you hold her down with ease, making you feel more confident about your decision to attack Destiny.

"Well, that was easy... Looks like Goddess Sasha's little helper has been taken down by a real man", you say arrogantly.

"Oh you think this is over?" Destiny says calmly.

Her soft and gentle tone makes you feel uneasy... You have her pinned to the ground, at a complete disadvantage both in her position and her size. Yet she is relaxed, focused and extremely confident. This rattles you slightly, making you hold her wrists a little tighter. She smiles as you suddenly feel her move...
113.title: She is part of this, attack her!

choices: Attack her and hope she releases you
Try to distract her with something
Beg her for mercy
1131.content:
You strengthen your grip and look Destiny in the eyes, trying to anticipate any move she could make to try and stop you. You are bigger, stronger and faster than her, so you aren't really worried... But with Goddess Sasha and her twisted mind games afoot, the last thing you need is to find yourself at the mercy of Destiny. Unfortunately for you, that is her plan!

You see it after it is too late to do anything about it. A faint shimmer of movement to your left and also to your right. You don't know which way to look, but as you look to the right you see the black boot of Destiny. Before you can let go of her write to grab the boot, it suddenly whips in front of you, along with the boot that is to your left. Destiny locks her legs around you and instantly you begin to feel a crushing weight closing in on your mid-section.

"Urghhhhh", you grunt as Destiny locks her ankles and continues to squeeze her legs together. You mind instantly thinks of James Bond in Golden Eye, when Xenia Onatopp crushes him between her legs. You remember him only just managing to escape her legs each time, but thinking what would happen if he was not able to get out... Unfortunately, with the position Destiny has you in, you may find out today!

"Well well, Mr Hot Shot doesn't seem so fucking hot now, does he?" Destiny says to you. As you are still on top of her, you are forced to look her in the eyes as she crushes the life out of you. She squeezes her legs even harder, causing you to grunt again, struggling in her vice like leg hold. "Are you ready to beg me for Mercy Ethan?"

You look around in desperation, hoping to see something you can use to free yourself. Or perhaps you can make a distraction or attack her and force her to release her hold? Of course the other option is the less desirable one, but maybe if you beg she just might let you out?
1131.title: Caught in her leg trap!

choices: Screw it...attack her again and teach her a lesson!
You're too intrigued to fight her now - listen to her!
11311.content:
Come on, you're much bigger, stronger than this stupid goth... attack her!

Growling in frustration, you suddenly throw your arms wildly at her, hoping that one of your haymakers will make contact.

Laughing at you, Destiny expertly arches her head back, easily avoiding your attempted blows. With a smirk, she puts even more pressure with her powerful thighs, making you this time let out a loud moan. "That's it? You're supposed to be tough jock, right? And you can't even fight your way out of a basic scissor hold?!"

"Let....go!" You spit out at her, feeling increasingly in pain and desperately needing to escape. "Get...off...me!"

"That doesn't sound like begging to mercy, to me, Ethan!" She laughs again, a sneer on her face. Flailing your arms wildly again, you manage to connect one fist to Destiny's chest, making her startle a little and relinquish her grip for a moment.

It's all you need. Forcing her strong legs off you, you snarl at her before throwing her to the ground so that she lands with a thud. Glaring at you, an expression of distaste on her face, the gothic girl does not look concerned however.

"Idiot," she tells you calmly. "Now, you can try attacking me again, or shut the fuck up and listen to me. I am not your enemy here...if you try to fight me one more time, I will not only beat the crap out of you, but you'll never find out about Goddess Sasha...what this is all about...how I know ALL about it. So come on - you don't even have to beg for mercy any more. Just agree to sit down and listen to me. What's it gonna be, Ethan?"

Destiny seems to be adopting a more reasonable tone with you. But can you trust her? She is seriously strong...yet she just a girl; you could take her if you really wanted to!
11311.title: Attack her and hope she releases you

choices: Keep a low profile until the curse wears off!
Training with Destiny to help you break the curse!
113112.content:
It takes a certain amount of swallowing your pride, but you simply have to know more. This goth at school is far too powerful, far too intriguing to ignore!

"OK...OK..." You step backwards and hold up your hands placatingly, watching her carefully as she rises to her feet. "Tell me what you know."

"No more of your crap like trying to take me on?" Destiny glowers at you, though you can see in her dark eyes that she is pleased you've decided to quit attacking her again.

"No..." you say, feeling a bit emasculated, though you know it's for the best.

"Good. So here's how it is. Goddess Sasha is a seriously powerful sorceress. She has been around for hundreds of years...if not more! Of course she doesn't age; she's immortal of course..." Destiny tells you, as though this must seem obvious. "Anyway, I've read about her - studied her, you could say. Goddess Sasha moves from town to town, country to country...all over the world; her mission is to put egotistical men in their place! Sometimes it will be in the guise of a fortune teller, like you would have seen this evening. Sometimes it could be in a derelict village, the other side of the world...or at a Las Vegas casino game....she is seriously powerful!"

"OK...but what...what's this got to do with me? And this carnival?" You ask her, feeling skeptical that the raven-haired girl is winding you up still.

"You came out of her tent. I saw you! Knowing you, Ethan..." She rolls her eyes at you, a look of distaste forming on her. "...You probably insulted her...came across as a jerk. Am I right?"

Shuffling your feet awkwardly but feeling automatically defensive, you glare at her. "No! She...she tried to charge me a hundred dollars! For a crappy fortune teller bullshit reading!"

"Ethan," Destiny tells you sternly. "Watch your mouth! Whatever you may think of Goddess Sasha, she is NOT a fraud! I have been monitoring her movements and energy for months...when I found out that she was coming here, to our town, at the annual carnival..." She rolls her eyes again, but has an excited look about her. "Well, I had to see for myself. In Wicca circles, she is like a major celebrity. All you need to worry about is appeasing her - not succumbing to her powers and allowing her to reduce you to a willing slave, but to show that you have learned something and that her magic has changed you for the better!"

"Her....willing slave?!" You practically spit.

"Ethan...everything around you is a mirage. The Carnival has been recreated by Goddess Sasha; everything has changed. Everyone here is just a pawn in her game - they may not be aware, but when she's done with you, they will forget everything but you won't! Well, she has some other associates...or 'lieutenants' as she calls them..."

"But you...what about you? And how do you know all this?" You blurt out at her, starting to feel like what she's saying could be genuine.

She smirks, an air of pomposity about her. "I've been studying the forces of nature for years, Ethan. I am at an advanced enough level to resist Goddess Sasha's magic; it has no effect on me. She has chosen YOU as her vessel, to toy with and to torture. She doesn't even need to do it herself - she will use people you know...not just your friends like that Casey girl, but other people. Celebrities, fictional characters...anyone at all that she can read and pluck from her mind!"

Feeling overwhelmed, you take a few deep breaths. If this weren't all true, then she has an incredibly creative imagination! Nodding at her, she looks pleased that you've accepted she is being honest with you.

"So...what do we do?" You ask her. The more time you spend with the goth, the more you grudgingly accept that she knows what she's talking about. "And...why are you helping me?!" It's a fair question - Destiny is not a friend; you actually actively disliked one another at school!

Rolling her eyes again, she gives you a knowing look. "Can you imagine it? Me being the one to thwart a sorceress like Goddess Sasha...do you have any idea how much this will improve my powers and reputation?!" Well, you buy it - she does seem so knowledgeable and is clearly motivated for her own gains, and is honest about it!

What is Destiny's plan of action?
113112.title: Listening to Destiny

info.brief_description: What happens when a Fortune Teller curses you? An interactive story perfect for foot fans!
info.description:
This story is brought to you by the same co-creators of 'Office Feet' - myself and Vincanity  . Check out our other interactives!

Ever been to a carnival before? Ever seen one of those creepy looking Fortune Teller tents? There's no way they can actually read your future, it's all fake.... Right?

Your name is Ethan, and you have just finished high school. You have a basketball scholarship lined up at a college halfway across the country and you're moving next week. So when your friends invite you to the annual carnival, you really can't say no!

After spotting one of those Fortune Teller tents, labelled 'Find Your Destiny With The Mystical Goddess Sasha...', you can't help but think about your future! You wonder if this Mystical Goddess could tell you how you will do at college. Maybe even see if you make it to the NBA! Your curiosity gets the better of you and you enter the tent...

Without a doubt, this proves to be the worst mistake of your life!

What happens when you meet Goddess Sasha and attempt to have your fortune told? Little do you know now but she has created a carnival based on your worst horrors. The Goddess has filled the carnival with ex girlfriends, enemies and rivals. She even manages to conjure up fictional characters that you've only ever read about in books or seen in movies... And they all have a common goal. To break you!

Another important factor is that Ethan has a serious hatred and revulsion for feet...expect that to be a major factor and obstacle on the journey!

Try to escape this carnival of horrors without being seduced, dominated, broken or even killed. Good luck!

Main Characters:

Ethan   - you, the main character. 18 years old, high school graduate and basketball player. Going to college on a sports scholarship, he has his entire life ahead of him... Or at least he thought! Tall, muscular physique, good-looking with wavy brown hair and can be a bit of a jerk. Others respect him due to his sporting prowess and charisma.

The Mystical Goddess Sasha - based on the real life Your Foot Goddess  . She is a Fortune Teller that is also a very powerful witch. She has the ability to manipulate minds, and enjoys putting arrogant men through hell. Her goal is to make men admit their inferiority to her and dedicate their lives to serving her for all eternity. Exotic and other-worldly, with a thick, foreign accent that's hard to place, this woman is both extremely attractive as well as dismissive and self-assured.

Lisa   - Ethan's ex girlfriend who he broke up with a few months ago. She is sexy and smart so why did Ethan dump her? She wasn't putting out for him so after a few fruitless months of trying to lay her he gave up and ended things. Short, athletic, tanned with a sometimes grumpy disposition.

Jessica   - Ethan has had a crush on this brunette for years! She is also on the cheerleading squad like Lisa, but is more confident and sassy. She believes she is a real princess and that every guy should wait on her hand and foot. For a guy not to worship the ground she walks on is considered a sin to her, a sin that should be punished! She is the only girl that Ethan struggles to be confident and cocky around.

Laura   - shy, dark-haired girl who used to be really good friends with Ethan up until a few years ago. At one point they were inseparable and loved playing computer games together. Since becoming more sporty and popular, Ethan discarded her, which left Laura hurt and resentful. Usually found buried in a book, generally a loner.

Celina  and Yasmine - Ethan's twin cousins who are nearly exactly a year older than him. Both of Lebanese descent from their Mum's side, these two girls are beautiful and glamorous. Big into feminism, which sounds contrary to their Arabic roots, they loathe Ethan and hate the fact that he can be an arrogant jerk. They used to tease him relentlessly and being older than him, ganged up on him, forcing him to paint their toenails and embarrass him!

Casey   - Ethan's oldest friend, he has known her since he was 5 years old. She is now a very good looking young woman! They went through grade school and high school together, sharing a history that makes them inseparable. Both being very attractive young people, they have often flirted playfully with one another but never taken it further due to their extremely close friendship. Ethan would trust Casey with his life.

Destiny  - Also from Ethan's high school, Destiny was the girl everybody avoided. She was a goth, always dressed in black with dark make up and dirty thick black boots. Students would often joke that she had worn the same boots since she started high school, but little did they know that was actually true, they were the same boots. She dabbles in witch craft, voodoo magic and believes she has powers. Ethan doesn't know her too well, and she doesn't really know him that well either.

Miss Stephens   - A young and attractive teacher just out of university, she was Ethan's Biology teacher from high school. She hates Ethan because she reminds him of the typical high school jocks that used to make fun of her when she was not so good looking back in high school. She actually failed Ethan in the hope that he would not get his scholarship, but was outraged to hear he was still offered the scholarship for his sporting ability. She would love to be the one to take him down!

Victoria - based on the real life Goddess Victoria   - A complete stranger, but this blonde sweetheart is so hot you can hardly stop yourself from drooling like a dog whenever you see her. It seems like she is always in the right place at the right time. When you're in a spot of trouble, need advice or are in desperate need of a saviour she seems to just... Appear? Using her help may be of benefit to you, but you better hope she is doing this just to be kind... Because if you owe her too much, you may be indebted to her!

And introducing Goddess Sasha's assistants...


Goddess Lucie - based on the real life Goddess Lucie  . This gorgeous British woman is an evil assistant of Goddess Sasha and is rumoured to be a manipulative seductress. She has shiny yellow hair and soft white skin, looking every bit the Goddess she is! However beware, because once she has you in her web at her flawless feet, you may never get out!

Goddess Bunny - based on the real life Goddess Bunny  . Goddess Bunny is your school girl seductress, with dyed ash hair and a look of innocence that is designed to draw you in, so she can then bring you to your knees at her perfect feet. Proceed with caution!

Goddess Lucie and Goddess Bunny can pop into the story at any point! Ethan would not know or recognise them; they could manipulate him in any way possible! For them, they would be 'winning' if they brought Ethan, willingly grovelling to Goddess Sasha at her feet!


Any other fictional or celebrity characters are welcome and encouraged! Goddess Sasha will scan what is in your mind to use against you!

Goddess Sasha will only reappear in the story if she is a) about to defeat Ethan and have him accept becoming her slave or b) he is doing too well at resisting the various women he gets involved with and has to force him to submit herself!


Rules

Stick to second person and present tense e.g. you see someone coming towards you.
Ethan can have ANYONE from his life involved - the characters above, real-life celebrities or fictional characters. Be as creative as you like!
This is primarily a foot fetish interactive but other fetishes are welcome! Nothing too extreme such as vore, scat etc. nor any underage characters allowed.
Only women are to be barefoot or to attempt dominating Ethan.
Please use proper grammar, spelling and punctuation. Incoherent chapters will be deleted. Option chapters (one liners with more choices) are fine.
Have fun and enjoy the carnival experience!

Ending Chapters

As mentioned about Goddess Sasha above, the story will end if Ethan fully surrenders to her. No more chapters after that point!
The story can also end if Ethan dies during The Carnival experience!
If, by some chance, Ethan is able to avoid surrendering to Goddess Sasha, than an ending chapter can be written to show that he 'wins'!
Ending chapters are OK as long as there is always another option available!

Now it's time to find out what happens when you meet Goddess Sasha! You are most certainly in for a hell of a ride!
